original: om devā ha vai sattraṃ niṣeduḥ agnirindraḥ somo makho viṣṇurviśve devā
analyzed: om devāḥ ha vai sattram niṣeduḥ agniḥ indraḥ somaḥ makhaḥ viṣṇuḥ viśve devāḥ

original: anyatraivāśvibhyām 14.1.1.[2]
analyzed: anyatra eva aśvibhyām

original: teṣām kurukṣetram devayajanamāsa tasmādāhuḥ kurukṣetram devānāṃ
analyzed: teṣām kurukṣetram deva yajanam āsa tasmāt āhuḥ kurukṣetram devānām

original: devayajanamiti tasmādyatra kva ca kurukṣetrasya nigacati tadeva manyata idam
analyzed: devayajanam iti tasmāt yatra kva ca kurukṣetrasya nigacati tat eva manyate idam

original: devayajanamiti taddhi devānāṃ devayajanam 14.1.1.[3]
analyzed: devayajanam iti tat hi devānām devayajanam

original: ta āsata śriyaṃ gacema yaśaḥ syāmānnādāḥ syāmeti tatho eveme sattramāsate śriyaṃ
analyzed: te āsata śriyam gacema yaśaḥ syāma anna ādāḥ syāma iti tathā u eva ime sattram āsate śriyam

original: gacema yaśaḥ syāmānnādāḥ syāmeti 14.1.1.[4]
analyzed: gacema yaśaḥ syāma anna ādāḥ syāma iti

original: te hocuḥ yo naḥ śrameṇa tapasā śraddhayā yaiñenāhutibhiryajñasyodṛcam
analyzed: te ha ūcuḥ yaḥ naḥ śrameṇa tapasā śraddhayā yaiñena āhutibhiḥ yajñasya udṛcam

original: pūrvo'vagacātsa naḥ śreṣṭho'sattadu naḥ sarveṣāṃ saheti tatheti 14.1.1.[5]
analyzed: pūrvaḥ uvagacāt sa naḥ śreṣṭhaḥ usat tat u naḥ sarveṣām saha iti tathā iti

original: tadviṣṇuḥ prathamaḥ prāpa sa devānāṃ śreṣṭho'bhavattasmādāhurviṣṇurdevānāṃ
analyzed: tat viṣṇuḥ prathamaḥ prāpa sa devānām śreṣṭhaḥ bhavat tasmāt āhuḥ viṣṇuḥ devānām

original: śreṣṭha iti 14.1.1.[6]
analyzed: śreṣṭhaḥ iti

original: sa yaḥ sa viṣṇuryajñaḥ sa sa yaḥ sa yajño'sau sa ādityastaddhedaṃ yaśo viṣnurna
analyzed: sa yaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ yajñaḥ sa sa yaḥ sa yajñaḥ usau saḥ ādityaḥ tat ha idam yaśaḥ viṣnuḥ na

original: śaśāka saṃyantu tadidamapyetarhi naiva sarva-iva yaśaḥ śaknoti saṃyantum 14.1.1.[7]
analyzed: śaśāka saṃyantu tat idam api etarhi na eva sarvā eva yaśaḥ śaknoti saṃyantum

original: sa tisṛdhanvamādāyāpacakrāma sa dhanurārtnyā śira upastabhya tasthau tam devā
analyzed: sa tisṛdhanvam ādāya apacakrāma sa dhanuḥ ārtnyā śiraḥ upastabhya tasthau tam devāḥ

original: anabhidhṛṣṇuvantaḥ samantam pariṇyaviśanta 14.1.1.[8]
analyzed: an abhidhṛṣṇuvantaḥ samantam pariṇyaviśanta

original: tā ha vamrya ūcuḥ imā vai vamryo yadupadīkā yo'sya jyāmapyadyātkimasmai
analyzed: tāḥ ha vamryaḥ ūcuḥ imāḥ vai vamryaḥ yat upadīkāḥ yaḥ usya jyām api adyāt kim asmai

original: prayacetetyannādyamasmai prayacemāpi dhanvannapo'dhigacettathāsmai
analyzed: prayaceta iti annādyam asmai prayacema api dhanvan apodhigacet tathā asmai

original: sarvamannādyam prayacemeti tatheti 14.1.1.[9]
analyzed: sarvam annādyam prayacema iti tathā iti

original: tasyopaparāsṛtya jyāmapijakṣustasyāṃ cinnāyāṃ dhanurārtnyau viṣphurantyau
analyzed: tasya upaparāsṛtya jyām apijakṣuḥ tasyām cinnāyām dhanuḥ ārtnyau viṣphurantyau

original: viṣṇoḥ śiraḥ pracicidatuḥ 14.1.1.[10]
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ śiraḥ pracicidatuḥ

analyzed: tat ghṛṅ iti papāta tat patitvā asau ādityaḥ bhavat atha itaraḥ prāṅ eva prāvṛjyata

analyzed: tat yat ghṛṅ iti apatat tasmāt gharmaḥ utha yat prāvṛjyata tasmāt pravargyaḥ

original: te devā abruvan mahānbata no vīro'dādīti tasmānmahāvīrastasya yo raso
analyzed: te devāḥ abruvan mahān bata naḥ vīraḥ udādi iti tasmāt mahāvīraḥ tasya yaḥ

original: vyakṣarattaṃ pāṇibhiḥ sammamṛjustasmātsammrāṭ 14.1.1.[12]
analyzed: vyakṣarat tam pāṇibhiḥ sammamṛjuḥ tasmāt sammrāj

original: tam devā abhyamṛjyanta yathā vittim vetsyamānā evam tamindraḥ prathamaḥ prāpa
analyzed: tam devāḥ abhyamṛjyanta yathā vittim vetsyamānāḥ evam tam indraḥ prathamaḥ prāpa

original: tamanvaṅgamanunyapadyata tam paryagṛhṇāttam parigṛhyedaṃ
analyzed: tam anvaṅgam anunyapadyata tam paryagṛhṇāt tam parigṛhya idam

original: yaśo'bhavadyadidamindro yaśo yaśo ha bhavati ya evam veda 14.1.1.[13]
analyzed: yaśaḥ bhavat yat idam indraḥ yaśaḥ yaśaḥ ha bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: sa u eva makhaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ tata indro makhavānabhavanmakhavānha vai tam

original: maghavānityācakṣate paro'kṣam paro'kṣakāmā hi devāḥ 14.1.1.[14]
analyzed: maghavān iti ācakṣate parokṣam parokṣa kāmāḥ hi devāḥ

original: tābhyo vamrībhyo'nnādyam prāyacan āpo vai sarvamannaṃ

original: tābhirhīdamabhiknūyamivādanti yadidaṃ kimvadanti 14.1.1.[15]
analyzed: tābhiḥ hi idam abhiknūyam iva adanti yat idam kim vadanti

original: athemam viṣṇuṃ yajñam tredhā vyabhajanta vasavaḥ prātaḥsavanaṃ rudrā

original: mādhyandinaṃ savanamādityāstṛtīyasavanam 14.1.1.[16]
analyzed: mādhyandinam savanam ādityāḥ tṛtīyasavanam

original: agniḥ prātaḥsavanam indro mādhyandinaṃ savanam viśve devāstṛtīyasavanam 14.1.1.[17]

analyzed: tena apaśīrṣṇā yajñena devāḥ arcantaḥ śrāmyantaḥ ceruḥ

original: dadhyaṅ ha vā ātharvaṇaḥ etaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam vidāṃ cakāra
analyzed: dadhyaṅ ha vai ātharvaṇaḥ etam śukram etam yajñam vidām cakāra

original: yathā-yathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavati 14.1.1.[19]

original: sa hendreṇokta āsa etam cedanyasmā anubrūyāstata eva te śiraścindyāmiti 14.1.1.[20]
analyzed: sa ha indreṇa uktaḥ āsa etam ced anyasmai anubrūyāḥ tatas eva te śiraḥ cindyām iti

original: tadu hāśvinoranuśrutamāsa dadhyaṅṅu ha vā ātharvaṇa etaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam
analyzed: tat u ha aśvinoḥ anuśrutam āsa dadhyaṅ u ha vai ātharvaṇaḥ etam śukram etam yajñam

original: veda yathāyathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavati 14.1.1.[21]

original: tau hetyocatuḥ upa tvāyāveti kimanuvakṣyamāṇāvityetaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam

original: yathā-yathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavatīti 14.1.1.[22]
analyzed: yathā yathā etat yajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathā eṣa kṛtsnaḥ yajñaḥ bhavati iti

original: sa hovāca indreṇa vā ukto'smyetaṃ cedanyasmā anubrūyāstata eva te śiraścindyāmiti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca indreṇa vai uktaḥ asmi etam ced anyasmai anubrūyāḥ tatas eva te śiraḥ cindyām iti

original: tasmādvai bibhemi yadvai me sa śiro na cindyānna vāmupaneṣya iti 14.1.1.[23]
analyzed: tasmāt vai bibhemi yat vai me sa śiraḥ na cindyāt na vām upaneṣye iti

original: tau hocatuḥ āvām tvā tasmāttrāsyāvaha iti katham mā trāsyethe iti yadā nā
analyzed: tau ha ūcatuḥ āvām tvā tasmāt trāsyāvaha iti katham mā trāsyethe iti yadā na

analyzed: upaneṣyasetha te śiraḥ cittvā anyatra apanidhāsyāvaḥ uta aśvasya śiraḥ āhṛtya tat te

original: te svaṃ śira āhṛtya tatte pratidhāsyāva iti tatheti 14.1.1.[24]
analyzed: te svam śiraḥ āhṛtya tat te pratidhāsyāvaḥ iti tathā iti

original: tau hopaninye tau yadopaninye'thāsya śiraścittvānyatrāpanidadhaturathāśvasya śira
analyzed: tau ha upaninye tau yadā upaninyetha asya śiraḥ cittvā anyatra apanidadhatuḥ atha aśvasya śiraḥ

original: yadīmuvācetyayataṃ taduvāceti haivaitaduktam 14.1.1.[26]
analyzed: yat īm uvāca iti ayatam tat uvāca iti ha eva etat uktam

original: tanna sarvasmā anubrūyāt enasyaṃ hi tadatho nenma indraḥ śiraścinadaditi yo nveva
analyzed: tat na sarvasmai anubrūyāt enasyam hi tat atha u na id me indraḥ śiraḥ cinadat iti yaḥ nu eva

original: jñātastasmai brūyādatha yo'nūcāno'tha yo'sya priyaḥ syānna tveva sarvasmā iva 14.1.1.[27]

original: samvatsaravāsine'nubrūyāt eṣa vai samvatsaro ya eṣa tapatyeṣa u
analyzed: samvatsara vāsinā anubrūyāt eṣa vai samvatsaraḥ yaḥ eṣa tapati eṣaḥ u

analyzed: pravargyaḥ tat etam eva etat prīṇāti tasmāt samvatsara vāsinā inubrūyāt

original: tisro rātrīrvrataṃ carati trayo vā ṛtavaḥ samvatsarasya samvatsara eṣa ya eṣa

analyzed: tapati eṣaḥ u pravargyaḥ tat etam eva etat prīṇāti tasmāt tisraḥ rātrīḥ vratam carati

original: taptamācāmati tapasvyanubravā ityamāṃsāśyanubrūte tapasvyanubravā iti 14.1.1.[30]

original: amṛnmayapāyī asti vā asyāṃ saṃsṛṣṭamiva yadasyāmanṛtam vadati

original: tasmādamṛnmayadāyī 14.1.1.[31]
analyzed: tasmāt a mṛd maya dāyī

original: netsatyānṛte saṃsṛjānīti 14.1.1.[32]
analyzed: na id satya anṛte saṃsṛjāni iti

original: athaiṣa vāva yaśaḥ ya eṣa tapati tadyattadādityo yaśo yajño haiva
analyzed: atha eṣa vāva yaśaḥ yaḥ eṣa tapati tat yat tat ādityaḥ yaśaḥ yajñaḥ ha eva

original: tadyaśastadyattadyajño yaśo yajamāno haiva tadyaśastadyattadyajamāno yaśa ṛtvijo

original: haiva tadyaśastadyattadṛtvijo yaśo dakṣiṇā haiva tadyaśastasmādyāmasmai

original: dakṣiṇāmānayeyurna tā itsadyo'nyasmā atidiśennedyanmedaṃ yaśa

analyzed: āgan tat sadyonyasmai atidiśāni iti śvas vā eva bhūte dvi ahe vā tat ātmani eva etat yaśaḥ

original: kṛtvā yadeva tadbhavati tatsa dadāti hiraṇyaṃ gām vāso'śvam vā 14.1.1.[33]
analyzed: kṛtvā yat eva tat bhavati tat sa dadāti hiraṇyam gām vāsaḥ ūśvam vā

original: athaitadvā āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūtebhakṣayati vā tasya
analyzed: atha etat vai āyuḥ etat jyotiḥ praviśati yaḥ etam anu vā brūte bhakṣayati vā tasya

original: vratacaryā nātapati pracādayeta nedetasmāttiro'sānīti nātapati
analyzed: vrata caryāḥ na ātapati pracādayeta na id etasmāt tirosāni iti na ātapati

original: niṣṭhīvennedetamabhiniṣṭhīvānīti nātapati prasrāvayeta nedetamabhiprasrāvayā iti

original: yāvadvā eṣa ātapati tāvāneṣa nedetametairhinasānītyavajyotya
analyzed: yāvat vai eṣaḥ ātapati tāvān eṣa na id etam etaiḥ hinasāni iti avajyotya

analyzed: rātrau aśnīyāt tat etat asya rūpam kriyate yaḥ eṣa tapati tat u ha uvāca āsuriḥ ekam ha vai

original: devā vrataṃ caranti yatsatyam tasmādu satyameva vadet 14.1.2.[1]
analyzed: devāḥ vratam caranti yat satyam tasmāt u satyam eva vadet

original: sa vai sambhārāntsambharati sa yadvā enānitthāccetthācca sambharati

original: sambharati 14.1.2.[2]

original: lomataścandāṃsi vai lomāni candaḥsvevainametatsambharatyuttarata udīcī hi
analyzed: lomataḥ candāṃsi vai lomāni candaḥsu eva enam etat sambharati uttaratas udīcī hi

original: manuṣyāṇāṃ dikprācīnagrīve taddhi devatrā 14.1.2.[3]
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām diś prācīnagrīve tat hi devatrā

original: abhryā vajro vā abhrirvīryam vai vajro vīryeṇaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
analyzed: abhryāḥ vajraḥ vai abhriḥ vīryam vai vajraḥ vīryeṇa eva enam etat samardhayati kṛtsnam
karoti

original: audumbarī bhavati ūrgvai rasa udumbara ūrjaivainametadrasena samardhayati
analyzed: audumbarī bhavati ūrj vai rasaḥ udumbaraḥ ūrjā eva enam etat rasena samardhayati

original: kṛtsnaṃ karoti 14.1.2.[5]
analyzed: kṛtsnam karoti

original: atho vaikaṅkatī prajāpatiryām prathamāmāhutimajuhotsa hutvā yatra nyamṛṣṭa tato
analyzed: atha u vaikaṅkatī prajāpatiḥ yām prathamām āhutim ajuhot sa hutvā yatra nyamṛṣṭa tatas

original: vikaṅkataḥ samabhavadyajño vā āhutiryajño vikaṅkato

original: yajñenaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnam karoti 14.1.2.[6]
analyzed: yajñena eva enam etat samardhayati kṛtsnam karoti

original: aratnimātrī bhavati bāhurvā aratnirbāhuno vai vīryaṃ kriyate vīryasammitaiva
analyzed: aratni mātrī bhavati bāhuḥ vai aratniḥ bāhunaḥ vai vīryam kriyate vīrya sammitā eva

original: tāmādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo hastābhyāmādade
analyzed: tām ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasava aśvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām ādade

original: nārirasītyasāveva bandhuḥ 14.1.2.[8]
analyzed: nāriḥ asi iti asau eva bandhuḥ

original: tāṃ savye pāṇau kṛtvā dakṣiṇenābhimṛśya japati yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo
analyzed: tām savye pāṇau kṛtvā dakṣiṇena abhimṛśya japati yuñjate manaḥ uta yuñjate dhiyaḥ

analyzed: śīrṣṇaḥ iti eva etat āha

original: pratitiṣṭhati 14.4.1.19
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati

original: te devā abruvan etāvadvā idaṃ sarvaṃ yadannaṃ tadātmana āgāsīranu no'sminnanna
analyzed: te devāḥ abruvan etāvat vai idam sarvam yat annam tat ātmane āgāsīḥ anu na usmin anna

original: ābhajasveti te vai mābhisamviśateti tatheti taṃ samantam pariṇyaviśanta
analyzed: ābhajasva iti te vai mā abhisamviśata iti tathā iti tam samantam pariṇyaviśanta

original: tasmādyadanenānnamatti tenaitāstṛpyantyevaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisamviśanti bhartā
analyzed: tasmāt yat anena annam atti tena etāḥ tṛpyanti evam ha vai enam svāḥ abhisamviśanti bhartā

original: svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavatyannādo'dhipatirya evam veda 14.4.1.20
analyzed: svānām śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavati anna āda odhipatiḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: ya u haivamvidam sveṣu pratipratirbubhūṣati na haivālam bhāryebhyo bhavatyatha
analyzed: yaḥ u ha evamvidam sveṣu pratipratiḥ bubhūṣati na ha eva alam bhāryebhyaḥ bhavati atha

original: ya evaitamanu bhavati yo vaitamanu bhāryānbubhūrṣati sa haivālam bhāryebhyo
analyzed: yaḥ eva etam anu bhavati yaḥ vā etam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa ha eva alam bhāryebhyaḥ

original: bhavati 14.4.1.21
analyzed: bhavati

original: so'yāsya āṅiraso aṅgānāṃ hi rasaḥ prāṇo vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ prāṇo hi vā aṅgānāṃ
analyzed: aṅgānām hi rasaḥ prāṇaḥ vai aṅgānām rasaḥ prāṇaḥ hi vai aṅgānām

original: rasastasmādyasmātkasmāccāṅgātprāṇa utkrāmati tadeva tacuṣyatyeṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ
analyzed: rasaḥ tasmāt yasmāt kasmāt ca aṅgāt prāṇaḥ utkrāmati tat eva tacuṣyati eṣa hi vai aṅgānām
rasaḥ

original: eṣa u eva bṛhaspatiḥ vāgvai bṛhatī tasyā eṣa patistasmādu bṛhaspatiḥ 14.4.1.23
analyzed: eṣaḥ u eva bṛhaspatiḥ vāc vai bṛhatī tasyāḥ eṣa patiḥ tasmāt u bṛhaspatiḥ

original: eṣa u eva brahmaṇaspatiḥ vāgvai brahma tasyā eṣa patistasmādu ha brahmaṇaspatiḥ 14.4.1.24
analyzed: eṣaḥ u eva brahmaṇaspatiḥ vāc vai brahma tasyāḥ eṣa patiḥ tasmāt u ha brahmaṇaspatiḥ

original: eṣa u eva sāma vāgvai sāmaiṣa sā cāmaśceti tatsāmnaḥ sāmatvaṃ yadveva samaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ u eva sāma vāc vai sāma eṣa sā ca amaḥ ca iti tat sāmnaḥ sāma tvam yat u eva samaḥ

original: pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo'nena sarveṇa
analyzed: pluṣiṇā samaḥ maśakena samaḥ nāgena samaḥ ebhiḥ tribhiḥ lokaiḥ samaḥ unena sarveṇa

original: tasmādveva sāmāśnute sāmnaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ ya evametatsāma veda 14.4.1.25
analyzed: tasmāt u eva sāma aśnute sāmnaḥ sāyujyam salokatām yaḥ evam etat sāma veda

original: eṣa u vā udgīthaḥ prāṇo vā utprāṇena hīdaṃ sarvamuttabdham vāgeva gīthocca
analyzed: eṣaḥ u vai udgīthaḥ prāṇaḥ vai ud prāṇena hi idam sarvam uttabdham vāc eva gīthā ucca

original: gīthā ceti sa udgīthaḥ 14.4.1.26
analyzed: gīthā ca iti saḥ udgīthaḥ

original: taddhāpi brahmadattaścaikitāneyo rājānam bhakṣayannuvācāyaṃ tyasya rājā
analyzed: tat ha api brahmadattaḥ caikitāneyaḥ rājānam bhakṣayan uvāca ayam tyasya rājā

original: mūrdhānam vipātayatādyadito'yāsya āṅgiraso'nyenodagāyaditi vācā ca hyeva sa
analyzed: mūrdhānam vipātayata adya itas yā asya āṅgirasaḥ unyena udagāyat iti vācā ca hi eva sa

original: prāṇena codagāyaditi 14.4.1.27
analyzed: prāṇena ca udagāyat iti

original: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ svam veda bhavati hāsya svaṃ tasya vai svara eva svaṃ
analyzed: tasya ha etasya sāmnaḥ yaḥ svam veda bhavati ha asya svam tasya vai svaraḥ eva svam

original: tasmādārtvijyaṃ kariṣyanvāci svaramiceta tayā vācā svarasampannayārtvijyaṃ
analyzed: tasmāt ārtvijyam kariṣyan vāci svaram iceta tayā vācā svara sampannayā ārtvijyam

original: kuryāttasmādyajñe svaravantaṃ didṛkṣanta evātho yasya svam bhavati bhavati hāsya
analyzed: kuryāt tasmāt yajñe svaravantam didṛkṣante eva atha u yasya svam bhavati bhavati ha asya

original: svam ya evametatsāmanaḥ svam veda 14.4.1.28
analyzed: svam yaḥ evam etat sāmanaḥ svam veda

original: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ suvarṇam veda bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ tasya vai svara eva
analyzed: tasya ha etasya sāmnaḥ yaḥ suvarṇam veda bhavati ha asya suvarṇam tasya vai svaraḥ eva

original: suvarṇam bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ ya evametatsāmnaḥ suvarṇam veda 14.4.1.29
analyzed: suvarṇam bhavati ha asya suvarṇam yaḥ evam etat sāmnaḥ suvarṇam veda

original: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ pratiṣṭhām veda prati ha tiṣṭhati tasya vai vāgeva
analyzed: tasya ha etasya sāmnaḥ yaḥ pratiṣṭhām veda prati ha tiṣṭhati tasya vai vāc eva

original: pratiṣṭhā vāci hi khalveṣa etatprāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhito gīyate'nna ityu haika āhuḥ 14.4.1.30
analyzed: pratiṣṭhā vāci hi khalu eṣaḥ etat prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ gīyate id naḥ iti u ha eke āhuḥ

original: athātaḥ pavamānānāmevābhyārohaḥ sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti sa yatra
analyzed: atha atas pavamānānām eva abhyārohaḥ sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti sa yatra

original: prastyuāttadetāni japedasato mā sadgamaya tamaso mā jyotirgamaya mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ
analyzed: japet asataḥ mā sat gamaya tamasaḥ mā jyotiḥ gamaya mṛtyoḥ mā amṛtam

original: gamayeti 14.4.1.31
analyzed: gamaya iti

original: sa yadāhāsato mā sadgamayeti mṛtyurvā asatsadamṛtam mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ
analyzed: sa yat āha asataḥ mā sat gamaya iti mṛtyuḥ vai asat sat amṛtam mṛtyoḥ mā amṛtam

original: gamayāmṛtam mā kurvityevaitadāha 14.4.1.32
analyzed: gamaya amṛtam mā kuru iti eva etat āha

original: tamaso mā jyotirgamayeti mṛtyurvai tamo jyotiramṛtam mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ
analyzed: tamasaḥ mā jyotiḥ gamaya iti mṛtyuḥ vai tamaḥ jyotiḥ amṛtam mṛtyoḥ mā amṛtam

original: gamayāmṛtam mā kurvityevaitadāha mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ gamayeti nātra tirohitamivāsti 14.4.1.33
analyzed: gamaya amṛtam mā kuru iti eva etat āha mṛtyoḥ mā amṛtam gamaya iti na atra tirohitam iva asti

original: atha yānītarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣvātmane'nnādyamāgāyettasmādu teṣu varam vṛṇīta yam
analyzed: atha yāni itarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣu ātmanā id nādyam āgāyet tasmāt u teṣu varam vṛṇīta yam

original: kāmaṃ kāmayeta taṃ sa eṣa evamvidudgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ
analyzed: kāmam kāmayeta tam saḥ eṣaḥ evamvid udgātā ātmane vā yajamānāya vā yam kāmam

original: kāmayate tamāgāyati taddhaitallokajideva na haivālokyatāyā āśāsti ya evametatsāma
analyzed: kāmayate tam āgāyati tat ha etat loka jit eva na ha eva a lokya tāyai āśāsti yaḥ evam etat sāma
veda

original: ātmaivedamagra āsīt puruṣavidhaḥ so'nuvīkṣya
analyzed: ātmā eva idam agre āsīt puruṣavidhaḥ saḥ unuvīkṣya

original: nānyadātmano'paśyatso'hamasmītyagrevyāharattato'haṃnāmābhavattasmādapyetarhyā
analyzed: na anyat ātmanā paśyatsaḥ ham asmi iti agre vyāharat tatas haṃnāmā bhavat tasmāt api etarhyā

original: mantrito'hamayamityevāgra uktvāthānyannāma prabrūte yadasya bhavati 14.4.2.[2]
analyzed: mantritaḥ uham ayam iti eva agre uktvā atha anyat nāma prabrūte yat asya bhavati

original: sa yatpūrvo'smāt sarvasmātsarvānpāpmana auṣattasmātpuruṣa oṣati ha vai sa taṃ
analyzed: sa yat pūrvaḥ sarvasmāt sarvān pāpmanaḥ auṣat tasmāt puruṣaḥ oṣati ha vai sa tam

original: yo'smātpūrvo bubhūṣati ya evam veda 14.4.2.[3]
analyzed: yaḥ usmāt pūrvaḥ bubhūṣati yaḥ evam veda

original: so'bibhet tasmādekākī bibheti sa hāyamīkṣāṃ cakre yanmadanyannāsti kasmānnu
analyzed: saḥ bibhet tasmāt ekākī bibheti sa ha ayam īkṣām cakre yat mat anyat na asti kasmāt nu

original: bibhemīti tata evāsya bhayam vīyāya kasmāddhyabheṣyaddvitīyadvai bhayam
analyzed: bibhemi iti tatas eva asya bhayam vīyāya kasmāt hi abheṣyat dvitīyat vai bhayam

original: bhavati 14.4.2.[4]
analyzed: bhavati

original: sa vai naiva reme tasmādekākī na ramate sa dvitīyamaicatsa haitāvānāsa yathā
analyzed: sa vai na eva reme tasmāt ekākī na ramate sa dvitīyam aicat sa ha etāvān āsa yathā

original: strīpumāṃsau sampariṣvaktau 14.4.2.[5]
analyzed: strī pumāṃsau sampariṣvaktau

original: sa imamevātmānaṃ dvedhāpātayat tataḥ patiśca patnī cābhavatāṃ
analyzed: saḥ imam eva ātmānam dvedhā apātayat tatas patiḥ ca patnī ca abhavatām

original: tasmādidamardhavṛgalamiva sva iti ha smāha yājñavalkyastasmādayamākāśa striyā
analyzed: tasmāt idam ardha vṛgalam iva svaḥ iti ha sma āha yājñavalkyaḥ tasmāt ayam ākāśaḥ striyā

original: pūryata eva tāṃ samabhavattato manuṣyā ajāyanta 14.4.2.[6]
analyzed: pūryataḥ eva tām samabhavat tatas manuṣyāḥ ajāyanta

original: so heyamīkṣāṃ cakre katham nu mātmana eva janayitvā sambhavati hanta
analyzed: saḥ ha iyam īkṣām cakre katham nu mā ātmanaḥ eva janayitvā sambhavati hanta

original: tiro'sānīti 14.4.2.[7]
analyzed: tirosāni iti

original: sā gaurabhavat vṛṣabha itarastāṃ samevābhavattato gāvo'jāyanta 14.4.2.[8]
analyzed: sā gauḥ abhavat vṛṣabhaḥ itaraḥ tām sam eva abhavat tatas gāvaḥ jāyanta

original: vaḍavetarābhavat aśvavṛṣa itaro gardabhītarā gardabha itarastāṃ samevābhavattata
analyzed: vaḍavā itarā bhavat aśvavṛṣaḥ itaraḥ gardabhītarā gardabhaḥ itaraḥ tām sam eva abhavat tata

original: ekaśaphamajāyata 14.4.2.[9]
analyzed: ekaśapham ajāyata

original: ajetarābhavat vasta itaro'viritaro meṣa itarastāṃ
analyzed: ajā itarā bhavat meṣaḥ itaraḥ tām

original: samevābhvattato'jāvayo'jāyantaivameva yadidaṃ kiṃ ca mithunamā
analyzed: sam eva abhvat tatas jāvayaḥ ujāyanta evam eva yat idam kim ca mithunam ā

original: pipīlikābhyastatsarvamasṛjata 14.4.2.[10]
analyzed: pipīlikābhyaḥ tat sarvam asṛjata

original: so'vet aham vāva sṛṣṭirasmyahaṃ hīdaṃ sarvamasṛkṣīti tataḥ sṛṣṭirabhavatsṛṣṭyāṃ
analyzed: sā uvet aham vāva sṛṣṭiḥ asmi aham hi idam sarvam asṛkṣi iti tatas sṛṣṭiḥ abhavat sṛṣṭyām

original: hāsyaitasyām bhavati ya evam veda 14.4.2.[11]
analyzed: ha asya etasyām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: athetyabhyamanthat sa mukhācca yonerhastābhyāṃ cāgnimasṛjata
analyzed: atha iti abhyamanthat sa mukhāt ca yoneḥ hastābhyām ca agnim asṛjata

original: tasmādetadubhayamalomakamantarato'lomakā hi yonirantarataḥ 14.4.2.[12]
analyzed: tasmāt etat ubhayam alomakam antarataḥ lomakā hi yoniḥ antarataḥ

original: tadyadidamāhuḥ amuṃ yajāmuṃ yajetyekaikaṃ devametasyaiva sā visṛṣṭireṣa u
analyzed: tat yat idam āhuḥ amum yaja amum yaja iti ekaikam devam etasya eva sā visṛṣṭiḥ eṣaḥ u

original: hyeva sarve devāḥ 14.4.2.[13]
analyzed: hi eva sarve devāḥ

original: atha yatkiṃ cedamārdram tadretaso'sṛjata tadu soma etāvadvā idaṃ sarvamannaṃ
analyzed: atha yat kim ca idam ārdram tat retasā usṛjata tat u somaḥ etāvat vai idam sarvam annam

original: caivānnādaśca soma evānnamagnirannādaḥ 14.4.2.[14]
analyzed: ca eva anna ādaḥ ca somaḥ eva annam agniḥ anna ādaḥ

original: saiṣā brahmaṇo'tisṛṣṭiḥ yacreyaso devānasṛjatātha yanmartyaḥ sannamṛtānasṛjata
analyzed: sā eṣā brahmaṇā utisṛṣṭiḥ yat creyasaḥ devān asṛjata atha yat martyaḥ san amṛtān asṛjata

original: tasmādatisṛṣṭiratisṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyām bhavati ya evam veda 14.4.2.[15]
analyzed: tasmāt atisṛṣṭiḥ atisṛṣṭyām ha asya etasyām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: taddhedaṃ tarhyavyākṛtamāsīt tannāmarūpābhyāmeva
analyzed: tat ha idam tarhi a vyākṛtam āsīt tat nāma rūpābhyām eva

original: vyākriyatāsaunāmāyamidaṃrūpa iti tadidamapyetarhi nāmarūpābhyāmeva
analyzed: vyākriyata asau nāmā ayam idaṃrūpaḥ iti tat idam api etarhi nāma rūpābhyām eva

original: vyākriyate'saunāmāyamidaṃrūpa iti 14.4.2.[16]
analyzed: vyākriyate asau nāmā ayam idaṃrūpaḥ iti

original: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ ā nakhāgrebhyo yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne'vahitaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ iha praviṣṭaḥ ā nakha agrebhyaḥ yathā kṣuraḥ kṣura dhānā vahitaḥ

original: syādviśvambharo vā viśvambharakulāye taṃ na paśyantyakṛtsno hi saḥ 14.4.2.[17]
analyzed: syāt viśvambharaḥ vā viśvambhara kulāye tam na paśyanti akṛtsnaḥ hi saḥ

original: prāṇanneva prāṇo nāma bhavati vadanvākpaśyaṃścakṣuḥ śṛṇvañcrotram manvāno
analyzed: prāṇan eva prāṇaḥ nāma bhavati vadan vāc paśyan cakṣuḥ śṛṇvan crotram manvānaḥ

original: manastānyasyaitāni karmanāmānyeva sa yo'ta ekaikamupāste na sa vedākṛtsno
analyzed: manaḥ tāni asya etāni karma nāmāni eva sa yaḥ uta ekaikam upāste na sa veda akṛtsnaḥ

original: hyeṣo'ta ekaikena bhavati 14.4.2.[18]
analyzed: hi eṣā uta ekaikena bhavati

original: ātmetyevopāsīta atra hyete sarva ekam bhavanti tadetatpadanīyamasya sarvasya
analyzed: ātmā iti eva upāsīta atra hi ete sarve ekam bhavanti tat etat padanīyam asya sarvasya

original: yadayamātmānena hyetatsarvam veda yathā ha vai padenānuvindedevaṃ kīrtiṃ
analyzed: yat ayam ātmā anena hi etat sarvam veda yathā ha vai padena anuvindet evam kīrtim

original: ślokam vindate ya evam veda 14.4.2.[19]
analyzed: ślokam vindate yaḥ evam veda

original: tadetatpreyaḥ putrāt preyo vittātpreyo'nyasmātsarvasmādantarataraṃ yadayamātmā sa
analyzed: tat etat preyaḥ putrāt preyaḥ vittāt preyaḥ nyasmāt sarvasmāt antarataram yat ayam ātmā sa

original: yo'nyamātmanaḥ priyam bruvāṇam brūyātpriyaṃ rotsyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva
analyzed: yonyam ātmanaḥ priyam bruvāṇam brūyāt priyam rotsyati iti īśvaraḥ ha tathā eva

original: syādātmānameva priyamupāsīta sa ya ātmānameva priyamupāste na hāsya priyam
analyzed: syāt ātmānam eva priyam upāsīta sa yaḥ ātmānam eva priyam upāste na ha asya priyam

original: pramāyukam bhavati 14.4.2.[20]
analyzed: pramāyukam bhavati

original: tadāhuḥ yadbrahmavidyayā sarvam bhaviṣyanto manuṣyā manyante kimu
analyzed: tat āhuḥ yat brahma vidyayā sarvam bhaviṣyantaḥ manuṣyāḥ manyante kimu

original: tadbrahmāvedyasmāttatsarvamabhavaditi 14.4.2.[21]
analyzed: tat brahma avet yasmāt tat sarvam abhavat iti

original: brahma vā idamagra āsīt tadātmānamevāvedaham brahmāsmīti
analyzed: brahma vai idam agre āsīt tat ātmānam eva avet aham brahma asmi iti

original: tasmāttatsarvamabhavattadyo-yo devānām pratyabudhyata sa eva
analyzed: tasmāt tat sarvam abhavat tat yaḥ yaḥ devānām pratyabudhyata saḥ eva

original: tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām 14.4.2.[22]
analyzed: tat abhavat tathā ṛṣīṇām tathā manuṣyāṇām

original: taddhaitatpaśyannṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede aham manurabhavaṃ sūryaśceti
analyzed: tat ha etat paśyan ṛṣiḥ vāmadevaḥ pratipede aham manuḥ abhavam sūryaḥ ca iti

original: tadidamapyetarhi ya evam vedāham brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvam bhavati tasya ha na
analyzed: tat idam api etarhi yaḥ evam veda aham brahma asmi iti saḥ idam sarvam bhavati tasya ha na

original: devāścanābhūtyā īśata ātmā hyeṣāṃ sa bhavatyatha yo'nyāṃ
analyzed: devāḥ cana ābhūtyai īśate ātmā hi eṣām sa bhavati atha yonyām

original: devatāmupāste'nyo'sāvanyo'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśurevaṃ sa devānāṃ yathā
analyzed: devatām upāste inyaḥ usau anyaḥ aham asmi iti na sa veda yathā paśuḥ evam sa devānām yathā

original: ha vai bahavaḥ paśavo manuṣyam bhuñjyurevamekaikaḥ puruṣo
analyzed: ha vai bahavaḥ paśavaḥ manuṣyam bhuñjyuḥ evam ekaikaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: devānbhunaktyekasminneva paśāvādīyamāne'priyam bhavati kimu bahuṣu
analyzed: devān bhunakti ekasmin eva paśau ādīyamāne priyam bhavati kimu bahuṣu

original: tasmādeṣāṃ tanna priyam yadetanmanuṣyā vidyuḥ 14.4.2.[23]
analyzed: tasmāt eṣām tat na priyam yat etat manuṣyāḥ vidyuḥ

original: brahma vā idamagra āsīt ekameva tadekaṃ sanna vyabhavattacreyo rūpamatyasṛjata
analyzed: brahma vai idam agre āsīt ekam eva tat ekam sat na vyabhavat tat creyaḥ rūpam atyasṛjata

original: kṣatraṃ yānyetāni devatrā kṣatrāṇīndro varuṇaḥ somo rudraḥ parjanyo yamo
analyzed: kṣatram yāni etāni devatrā kṣatrāṇi indraḥ varuṇaḥ somaḥ rudraḥ parjanyaḥ yamaḥ

original: mṛtyurīśāna iti tasmātkṣatrātparaṃ nāsti tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyamadhastādupāste
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ īśānaḥ iti tasmāt kṣatrāt param na asti tasmāt brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyam adhastāt upāste

original: rājasūye kṣatra eva tadyaśo dadhāti saiṣā kṣatrasya yoniryadbrahma tasmādyadyapi
analyzed: rājasūye kṣatre eva tat yaśaḥ dadhāti sā eṣā kṣatrasya yoniḥ yat brahma tasmāt yadi api

original: rājā paramatāṃ gacati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yoniṃ ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ
analyzed: rājā parama tām gacati brahma eva antatas upaniśrayati svām yonim yaḥ u enam hinasti svām

original: sa yonimṛcati sa pāpīyānbhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā 14.4.2.[24]
analyzed: sa yonim ṛcati sa pāpīyān bhavati yathā śreyāṃsam hiṃsitvā

original: sa naiva vyabhavat sa viśamasṛjata yānyetāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo
analyzed: sa na eva vyabhavat sa viśam asṛjata yāni etāni deva jātāni gaṇaśas ākhyāyante vasavaḥ

original: rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti 14.4.2.[25]
analyzed: rudrāḥ ādityāḥ viśve devāḥ marutaḥ iti

original: sa naiva vyabhavat sa śaudram varṇamasṛjata pūṣaṇamiyam vai pūṣeyaṃ hīdaṃ
analyzed: sa na eva vyabhavat sa śaudram varṇam asṛjata pūṣaṇam iyam vai pūṣā iyam hi idam

original: sarvam puṣyati yadidaṃ kiṃ ca 14.4.2.[26]
analyzed: sarvam puṣyati yat idam kim ca

original: sa naiva vyabhavat tacreyo rūpamatyasṛjata dharmaṃ tadetatkṣatrasya kṣatraṃ
analyzed: sa na eva vyabhavat tat reyaḥ rūpam atyasṛjata dharmam tat etat kṣatrasya kṣatram

original: yaddharmastasmāddharmātparaṃ nāstyatho abalīyānbalīyāṃsmam:/
analyzed: yat dharmaḥ tasmāt dharmāt param na asti atha u a balīyān balīyān

original: śaṃsate dharmeṇa
analyzed: śaṃsate dharmeṇa

original: yathā rājñaivaṃ yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyam vai tattasmātsatyam
analyzed: yathā rājñā evam yaḥ vai sa dharmaḥ satyam vai tat tasmāt satyam

original: vadantamāhurdharmam vadatīti dharmam vā vadantaṃ satyam
analyzed: vadantam āhuḥ dharmam vadati iti dharmam vā vadantam satyam

original: vadatītyetaddhyevaitadubhayam bhavati 14.4.2.[27]
analyzed: vadati iti etat hi eva etat ubhayam bhavati

original: tadetadbrahma kṣatram viṭ śūdraḥ tadagninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavadbrāhmaṇo
analyzed: tat etat brahma kṣatram viś śūdraḥ tat agninā eva deveṣu brahma abhavat brāhmaṇaḥ

original: manuṣyeṣu kṣatriyeṇa kṣatriyo vaiśyena vaiśyaḥ śūdreṇa śūdrastasmādagnāveva
analyzed: manuṣyeṣu kṣatriyeṇa kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyena vaiśyaḥ śūdreṇa śūdraḥ tasmāt agnau eva

original: deveṣu lokamicante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣvetābhyāṃ hi rūpābhyām brahmābhavat 14.4.2.[28]
analyzed: deveṣu lokam icante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣu etābhyām hi rūpābhyām brahmā abhavat

original: atha yo ha vā asmāllokātsvaṃ lokamadṛṣṭvā praiti sa enamavidito na bhunakti yathā
analyzed: atha yaḥ ha vai asmāt lokāt svam lokam a dṛṣṭvā praiti saḥ enam aviditaḥ na bhunakti yathā

original: vedo vānanūkto'nyadvā karmākṛtam yadi ha vā apyanevamvinmahatpuṇyaṃ karma
analyzed: vedaḥ vā an anūktaḥ anyat vā karma a kṛtam yadi ha vai api anevamvid mahat puṇyam karma

original: karoti taddhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata evātmānameva lokamupāsīta sa ya ātmānameva
analyzed: karoti tat ha asya antatas kṣīyate eva ātmānam eva lokam upāsīta sa yaḥ ātmānam eva

original: lokamupāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate'smāddhyevātmano yadyatkāmayate tattatsṛjate 14.4.2.[29]
analyzed: lokam upāste na ha asya karma kṣīyate ismāt hi eva ātmanaḥ yat yat kāmayate tat tat sṛjate

original: atho ayam vā ātmā sarveṣām bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ sa yajjuhoti yadyajate tena devānāṃ
analyzed: atha u ayam vai ātmā sarveṣām bhūtānām lokaḥ sa yat juhoti yat yajate tena devānām

original: loko'tha yadanubrūte tenarṣīṇāmatha yatprajāmicate yatpitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti tena
analyzed: lokaḥ utha yat anubrūte tena ṛṣīṇām atha yat prajām icate yat pitṛbhyaḥ nipṛṇāti tena

original: pitṝṇāmatha yanmanuṣyānvāsayate yadebhyo'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇāmatha
analyzed: pitṝṇām atha yat manuṣyān vāsayate yat ebhyaḥ ośanam dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām atha

original: yatpaśubhyastṛṇodakam vindati tena paśūnāṃ yadasya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsyā
analyzed: yat paśubhyaḥ tṛṇa udakam vindati tena paśūnām yat asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsyā

original: pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ loko yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭimicedevaṃ
analyzed: pipīlikābhyaḥ upajīvanti tena teṣām lokaḥ yathā ha vai svāya lokāya ariṣṭim icet evam

original: haivamvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtānyariṣṭimicanti tadvā etadviditam mīmāṃsitam 14.4.2.[30]
analyzed: ha evamvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni ariṣṭim icanti tat vai etat viditam mīmāṃsitam

original: ātmaivedamagra āsīt eka eva so'kāmayata jāyā me syādatha prajāyeyātha vittam me
analyzed: ātmā eva idam agre āsīt ekaḥ eva saḥ u kāmayata jāyā me syāt atha prajāyeya atha vittam me

original: syādatha karma kurvīyetyetānvāvai kāmo necaṃścanāto bhūyo
analyzed: syāt atha karma kurvīya iti etān vāvai kāmaḥ na ican cana atas bhūyas

original: vindettasmādapyetarhyekākī kāmayate jāyā me syādatha prajāyeyātha vittam me
analyzed: vindet tasmāt api etarhi ekākī kāmayate jāyā me syāt atha prajāyeya atha vittam me

original: syādatha karma kurvīyeti sa yāvadapyeteṣāmekaikaṃ na prāpnotyakṛtsna eva
analyzed: syāt atha karma kurvīya iti sa yāvat api eteṣām ekaikam na prāpnoti akṛtsnaḥ eva

original: tāvanmanyate tasyo kṛtsnatā 14.4.2.[31]
analyzed: tāvat manyate tasya u kṛtsna tā

original: mana evāsyātmā vāgjāyā prāṇaḥ prajā cakṣurmānuṣam vittam cakṣuṣā hi
analyzed: manaḥ eva asya ātmā vāc jāyā prāṇaḥ prajā cakṣuḥ mānuṣam vittam cakṣuṣā hi

original: tadvindati śrotraṃ daivaṃ śrotreṇa hi tacṛṇotyātmaivāsya karmātmanā hi karma karoti
analyzed: tat vindati śrotram daivam śrotreṇa hi tat ṛṇoti ātmā eva asya karma ātmanā hi karma karoti

original: sa eṣa pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktamidaṃ kiṃ ca tadidaṃ
analyzed: saḥ eṣa pāṅktaḥ yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktam idam kim ca tat idam

original: sarvamāpnoti yadidaṃ kiṃ ca ya evam veda 14.4.3.[1]
analyzed: sarvam āpnoti yat idam kim ca yaḥ evam veda

original: yatsaptānnāni medhayā tapasājanayatpitā ekamasya sādhāraṇam dve devānabhājayat
analyzed: yat sapta annāni medhayā tapasā ajanayat pitā ekam asya sādhāraṇam dve devān abhājayat

original: trīṇyātmane'kuruta paśubhya ekam prāyacat tasmintsarvam pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca
analyzed: trīṇi ātmanekuruta paśubhyaḥ ekam prāyacat tasmin sarvam pratiṣṭhitam yat ca

original: prāṇiti yacca na kasmāttāni na kṣīyante'dyamānāni sarvadā yo vai tāmakṣitim veda
analyzed: prāṇiti yat ca na kasmāt tāni na kṣīyantedyamānāni sarvadā yaḥ vai tām akṣitim veda

original: so'nnamatti pratīkena sa devānapigacati sa ūrjamupajīvatīti ślokāḥ 14.4.3.[2]
analyzed: saḥ unnamatti pratīkena sa devān apigacati saḥ ūrjam upajīvati iti ślokāḥ

original: yatsaptānnāni medhayā tapasājanayatpiteti medhayā hi tapasājanayatpitaikamasya
analyzed: yat sapta annāni medhayā tapasā ajanayat pitā iti medhayā hi tapasā ajanayat pitā ekam asya

original: sādhāraṇamitīdamevāsya tatsādhāraṇamannaṃ yadidamadyate sa ya etadupāste na sa
analyzed: sādhāraṇam iti idam eva asya tat sādhāraṇam annam yat idam adyate sa yaḥ etat upāste na sa

original: pāpmano vyāvartate miṣraṃ hyetat 14.4.3.[3]
analyzed: pāpmanaḥ vyāvartate miṣram hi etat

original: dve devānabhājayaditi hutaṃ ca prahutaṃ ca tasmāddevebhyo juhvati ca pra ca
analyzed: dve devān abhājayat iti hutam ca prahutam ca tasmāt devebhyaḥ juhvati ca pra ca

original: juhvatyatho āhurdarśapūrṇamāsāviti tasmānneṣṭiyājukaḥ syāt 14.4.3.[4]
analyzed: juhvati atha u āhuḥ darśapūrṇamāsau iti tasmāt na iṣṭi yājukaḥ syāt

original: paśubhya ekam prāyacaditi tatpayaḥ payo hyevāgre manuṣyāśca paśavaścopajīvanti
analyzed: paśubhyaḥ ekam prāyacat iti tat payaḥ payaḥ hi eva agre manuṣyāḥ ca paśavaḥ ca upajīvanti

original: tasmātkumāraṃ jātaṃ ghṛtam vaivāgre pratilehayanti stanam vānudhāpyanti 14.4.3.[5]
analyzed: tasmāt kumāram jātam ghṛtam vā eva agre pratilehayanti stanam vā anudhāpyanti

original: atha vatsaṃ jātamāhuḥ atṛṇāda iti tasmintsarvam pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti
analyzed: atha vatsam jātam āhuḥ a tṛṇa ādaḥ iti tasmin sarvam pratiṣṭhitam yat ca prāṇiti yat ca na iti

original: payasi hīdaṃ sarvam pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na 14.4.3.[6]
analyzed: payasi hi idam sarvam pratiṣṭhitam yat ca prāṇiti yat ca na

original: tadyadidamāhuḥ samvatsaram payasā juhvadapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti na tathā
analyzed: tat yat idam āhuḥ samvatsaram payasā juhvat apa punarmṛtyum jayati iti na tathā

original: vidyādyadahareva juhoti tadahaḥ punarmṛtyumāpajayatyevam vidvāntsarvaṃ hi
analyzed: vidyāt yat ahar eva juhoti tat ahar punarmṛtyum āpajayati evam vidvān sarvam hi

original: devebhyo'nnādyam prayacati kasmāttāni na kṣīyante'dyamānāni sarvadeti 14.4.3.[7]
analyzed: devebhyaḥ unnādyam prayacati kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante idyamānāni sarvadā iti

original: puruṣo vā akṣitiḥ sa hīdamannam punaḥ-punarjanayate yo vai tāmakṣitim vedeti
analyzed: puruṣaḥ vai akṣitiḥ sa hi idam annam punar punar janayate yaḥ vai tām akṣitim veda iti

original: puruṣo vā akṣitiḥ sa hīdamannaṃ dhiyā-dhiyā janayate karmabhiryaddhaitanna
analyzed: puruṣaḥ vai akṣitiḥ sa hi idam annam dhiyā dhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ yat ha etat na

original: kuryātkṣīyeta ha so'nnamatti pratīkeneti mukham pratīkam mukhenetyetatsa
analyzed: kuryāt kṣīyeta ha saḥ unnamatti pratīkena iti mukham pratīkam mukhena iti etat sa

original: devānapigacati sa ūrjamupajīvatīti praśaṃsā 14.4.3.[8]
analyzed: devān apigacati saḥ ūrjam upajīvati iti praśaṃsā

original: trīṇyātmane'kuruteti mano vācam prāṇaṃ tānyātmane'kurutānyatramanā abhūvaṃ
analyzed: trīṇi ātmanekuruta iti manaḥ vācam prāṇam tāni ātmanekuruta anyatramanāḥ abhūvam

original: nādarśamanyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣamiti manasā hyeva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti 14.4.3.[9]
analyzed: na adarśam anyatramanāḥ abhūvam na aśrauṣam iti manasā hi eva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti

original: kāmaḥ saṅkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtiradhṛtirhrīrdhīrbhīrityetatsarvam
analyzed: kāmaḥ saṅkalpaḥ vicikitsā śraddhā aśraddhā dhṛtiḥ adhṛtiḥ hrīḥ dhīḥ bhīḥ iti etat sarvam

original: mana eva tasmādapi pṛṣṭhata upaspṛṣṭo manasā vijānāti 14.4.3.[10]
analyzed: manaḥ eva tasmāt api pṛṣṭhatas upaspṛṣṭaḥ manasā vijānāti

original: yaḥ kaśca śabdo vāgeva saiṣā hyantamāyattaiṣā hi na prāṇo'pāno vyāna udānaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ kaḥ ca śabdaḥ vāc eva sā eṣā hi antam āyattā eṣā hi na prāṇa upānaḥ vyānaḥ udānaḥ

original: samāno'na ityetatsarvam prāṇa evaitanmanyo vā ayamātmā vāṅmayo manomayaḥ
analyzed: samāna ūnaḥ iti etat sarvam prāṇaḥ eva etat manyaḥ vai ayam ātmā vāc mayaḥ manaḥ mayaḥ

original: prāṇamayaḥ 14.4.3.[11]
analyzed: prāṇa mayaḥ

original: trayo lokā eta eva vāgevāyaṃ loko mano'ntarikṣalokaḥ prāṇo'sau lokaḥ 14.4.3.[12]
analyzed: trayaḥ lokāḥ ete eva vāc eva ayam lokaḥ manaḥ ntarikṣa lokaḥ prāṇaḥ asau lokaḥ

original: trayo vedā eta eva vāgevargvedo mano yajurvedaḥ prāṇaḥ sāmavedaḥ 14.4.3.[13]
analyzed: trayaḥ vedāḥ ete eva vāc eva ṛgvedaḥ manaḥ yajurvedaḥ prāṇaḥ sāmavedaḥ

original: devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā eta eva vāgeva devā manaḥ pitaraḥ prāṇo manuṣyāḥ 14.4.3.[14]
analyzed: devāḥ pitaraḥ manuṣyāḥ ete eva vāc eva devāḥ manaḥ pitaraḥ prāṇaḥ manuṣyāḥ

original: pitā mātā prajaita eva mana eva pitā vāṅgmātā prāṇaḥ prajā 14.4.3.[15]
analyzed: pitā mātā prajā ete eva manaḥ eva pitā vāc mātā prāṇaḥ prajā

original: vijñātam vijijñāsyam avijñātameta eva yatkiṃ ca vijñātam vācastadrūpam vāgghi
analyzed: vijñātam vijijñāsyam a vijñātam ete eva yat kim ca vijñātam vācaḥ tat rūpam vāc hi

original: vijñātā vāgenaṃ tadbhūtvāvati 14.4.3.[16]
analyzed: vijñātā vāc enam tat bhūtvā avati

original: yatkiṃ ca vijijñāsyam manastadrūpam mano hi vijijñāsyam mana eva tadbhūtvāvati 14.4.3.[17]
analyzed: yat kim ca vijijñāsyam manaḥ tat rūpam manaḥ hi vijijñāsyam manaḥ eva tat bhūtvā avati

original: yatkiṃ cāvijñātam prāṇasya tadrūpam prāṇo hyavijñātaḥ prāṇa eva tadbhūtvāvati 14.4.3.[18]
analyzed: yat kim ca a vijñātam prāṇasya tat rūpam prāṇaḥ hi a vijñātaḥ prāṇaḥ eva tat bhūtvā avati

original: tasyai vācaḥ pṛthivī śarīram jyotī rūpamayamagnistadyāvatyeva vāktāvatī pṛthivī
analyzed: tasyai vācaḥ pṛthivī śarīram jyotiḥ rūpam ayam agniḥ tat yāvatī eva vāc tāvatī pṛthivī

original: tāvānayamagniḥ 14.4.3.[19]
analyzed: tāvān ayam agniḥ

original: athaitasya manaso dyauḥ śarīraṃ jyotī rūpamasāvādityastadyāvadeva manastāvatī
analyzed: atha etasya manasaḥ dyauḥ śarīram jyotiḥ rūpam asau ādityaḥ tat yāvat eva manaḥ tāvatī

original: dyaustāvānasāvādityastau mithunaṃ samaitāṃ tataḥ prāṇo'jāyata sa indraḥ sa
analyzed: dyauḥ tāvān asau ādityaḥ tau mithunam samaitām tatas prāṇaḥ ujāyata saḥ indraḥ sa

original: eṣo'sapatno dvitīyo vai sapatno nāsya sapatno bhavati ya evam veda 14.4.3.[20]
analyzed: eṣaḥ sapatnaḥ dvitīyaḥ vai sapatnaḥ na asya sapatnaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: athaitasya prāṇasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ jyotī rūpamasau candrastadyāvā neva prāṇastāvatya
analyzed: atha etasya prāṇasya āpaḥ śarīram jyotiḥ rūpam asau candraḥ tat yāvā na iva prāṇaḥ tāvatyaḥ

original: āpastāvānasau candraḥ 14.4.3.[21]
analyzed: āpaḥ tāvān asau candraḥ

original: ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve'nantāḥ sa yo haitānantavata upāste'ntavataṃ sa lokaṃ
analyzed: te ete sarve eva samāḥ sarva inantāḥ sa yaḥ ha etān anantavataḥ upāsta intavatam sa lokam

original: jayatyatha yo haitānanantānupāste'nantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati 14.4.3.[22]
analyzed: jayati atha yaḥ ha etān anantān upāstena antam sa lokam jayati

original: sa eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakalastasya rātraya eva pañcadaśa kalā
analyzed: saḥ eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśa kalaḥ tasya rātrayaḥ eva pañcadaśa kalā

original: dhruvaivāsya ṣoḍaśī kalā sa rātribhirevā ca pūryate'pa ca kṣīyate so'māvāsyāṃ
analyzed: dhruvā eva asya ṣoḍaśī kalā sa rātribhiḥ eva ā ca pūryate ipa ca kṣīyate somāvāsyām

original: rātrimetayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvamidam prāṇabhṛdanupraviśya tataḥ prātarjāyate
analyzed: rātrim etayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvam idam prāṇabhṛt anupraviśya tatas prātar jāyate

original: tasmādetāṃ rātrim prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicindyādapi kṛkalāsasyaitasyā eva devatāyā
analyzed: tasmāt etām rātrim prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇam na vicindyāt api kṛkalāsasya etasyāḥ eva devatāyāḥ

original: apacityai 14.4.3.[23]
analyzed: apacityai

original: yo vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakalo'yameva sa yo'yamevaṃvitpuruṣastasya
analyzed: yaḥ vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśa kalaḥ yam eva sa yaḥ yam evaṃvid puruṣaḥ tasya

original: vittameva pañcadaśa kalā ātmaivāsya ṣoḍaśī kalā sa vittenaivā ca pūryate'pa ca
analyzed: vittam eva pañcadaśa kalāḥ ātmā eva asya ṣoḍaśī kalā sa vittena eva ā ca pūryatepa ca

original: kṣīyate tadetannabhyaṃ yadayamātmā pradhirvittaṃ tasmādyadyapi sarvajyāniṃ
analyzed: kṣīyate tat etat nabhyam yat ayam ātmā pradhiḥ vittam tasmāt yadi api sarva jyānim

original: jīyata ātmanā cejjīvati pradhināgādityāhuḥ 14.4.3.[24]
analyzed: jīyate ātmanā ced jīvati pradhi nāgāt iti āhuḥ

original: atha trayo vāva lokāḥ manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti so'yam manuṣyalokaḥ
analyzed: atha trayaḥ vāva lokāḥ manuṣya lokaḥ pitṛ lokaḥ deva lokaḥ iti saḥ ayam manuṣya lokaḥ

original: putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā pitṛloko vidyayā devaloko devaloko vai lokānāṃ
analyzed: putreṇa eva jayyaḥ na anyena karmaṇā pitṛ lokaḥ vidyayā deva lokaḥ deva lokaḥ vai lokānām

original: śreṣṭhastasmādvidyām praśaṃsanti 14.4.3.[25]
analyzed: śreṣṭhaḥ tasmāt vidyām praśaṃsanti

original: athātaḥ samprattiḥ yadā praiṣyanmanyate'tha putramāha tvam brahma tvaṃ
analyzed: atha atas samprattiḥ yadā praiṣyan manyatetha putram āha tvam brahma tvam

original: yajñastvaṃ loka iti sa putraḥ pratyāhāham brahmāhaṃ yajño'haṃ loka iti 14.4.3.[26]
analyzed: yajñaḥ tvam lokaḥ iti sa putraḥ pratyāha aham brahmā aham yajñaḥ ham lokaḥ iti

original: yadvai kiṃ cānūktam tasya sarvasya brahmetyekatā ye vai ke ca yajñāsteṣāṃ
analyzed: yat vai kim ca anūktam tasya sarvasya brahma iti ekatā ye vai ke ca yajñāḥ teṣām

original: sarveṣāṃ yajña ityekatā ye vai ke ca lokāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ityekataitāvadvā idaṃ
analyzed: sarveṣām yajñaḥ iti ekatā ye vai ke ca lokāḥ teṣām sarveṣām lokaḥ iti ekatā etāvat vai idam

original: sarvametanmā sarvaṃ sannayamito bhunajaditi tasmātputramanuśiṣṭaṃ
analyzed: sarvam etat mā sarvam san ayam itas bhunajat iti tasmāt putram anuśiṣṭam

original: lokyamāhustasmādenamanuśāsati sa yadaivaṃvidasmāllokātpraityathaibhireva prāṇaiḥ
analyzed: lokyam āhuḥ tasmāt enam anuśāsati sa yadā evaṃvid asmāt lokāt praiti atha ebhiḥ eva prāṇaiḥ

original: saha putramāviśati sa yadyanena kiṃcidakṣṇayākṛtam bhavati tasmādenaṃ
analyzed: saha putram āviśati sa yadi anena kiṃcid akṣṇayākṛtam bhavati tasmāt enam

original: sarvasmātputro muñcati tasmātputro nāma sa putreṇaivāsmiṃloke
analyzed: sarvasmāt putraḥ muñcati tasmāt putraḥ nāma sa putreṇa eva asmin loke

original: pratitiṣṭhatyathainamete daivāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti 14.4.3.[27]
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati atha enam ete daivāḥ prāṇāḥ amṛtāḥ āviśanti

original: pṛthivyai cainamagneśca daivī vāgāviśati sā vai daivī vāgyayā yadyadeva vadati
analyzed: pṛthivyai ca enam agneḥ ca daivī vāc āviśati sā vai daivī vāgyayā yat yat eva vadati

original: tattadbhavati 14.4.3.[28]
analyzed: tat tat bhavati

original: divaścainamādityācca daivam mana āviśati tadvai daivam mano yenānandyeva
analyzed: divaḥ ca enam ādityāt ca daivam manaḥ āviśati tat vai daivam manaḥ yena ānandya iva

original: bhavatyatho na śocati 14.4.3.[29]
analyzed: bhavati atha u na śocati

original: adbhyaścainaṃ candramasaśca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ
analyzed: adbhyaḥ ca enam candramasaḥ ca daivaḥ prāṇaḥ āviśati sa vai daivaḥ prāṇaḥ yaḥ

original: saṃcaraṃścāsaṃcaraṃśca na vyathate'tho na riśyati sa eṣa evaṃvitsarveṣām
analyzed: saṃcaran ca a saṃcaran ca na vyathatetho na riśyati saḥ eṣaḥ evaṃvid sarveṣām

original: bhūtānāmātmā bhavati yathaiṣā devataivaṃ sa yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi
analyzed: bhūtānām ātmā bhavati yathā eṣā devatā evam sa yathā etām devatām sarvāṇi

original: bhūtānyavantyevaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti yadu kiṃ cemāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni avanti evam ha evaṃvidam sarvāṇi bhūtāni avanti yat u kim ca imāḥ prajāḥ

original: śocantyamaivāsāṃ tadbhavati puṇyamevāmuṃ gacati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacati 14.4.3.[30]
analyzed: śocanti amā eva āsām tat bhavati puṇyam eva amum gacati na ha vai devān pāpam gacati

original: athāto vratamīmāṃsā prajāpatirha karmāṇi sasṛje tāni sṛṣṭānyanyo'nyenāspardhanta
analyzed: atha atas vrata mīmāṃsā prajāpatiḥ ha karmāṇi sasṛje tāni sṛṣṭāni anyonyena aspardhanta

original: vadiṣyāmyevāhamiti vāgdadhre drakṣyāmyahamiti cakṣuḥ śroṣyāmyahamiti
analyzed: vadiṣyāmi eva aham iti vāc dadhre drakṣyāmi aham iti cakṣuḥ śroṣyāmi aham iti

original: śrotramevamanyāni karmāṇi yathākarma 14.4.3.[31]
analyzed: śrotram evam anyāni karmāṇi yathākarma

original: tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme tānyāpnottānyāptvā mṛtyuravārunddha
analyzed: tāni mṛtyuḥ śramaḥ bhūtvā upayeme tāni āpnot tāni āptvā mṛtyuḥ avārunddha

original: tasmācrāmyatyeva vākśrāmyati cakṣuḥ śrāmyati śrotramathemameva nāpnodyo'yam
analyzed: tasmāt ācrāmyati eva vāc śrāmyati cakṣuḥ śrāmyati śrotram atha imam eva na āpnot yaḥ ayam

original: madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ 14.4.3.[32]
analyzed: madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ

original: tāni jñātuṃ dadhrire 'yaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃścāsaṃcaraṃśca na
analyzed: tāni jñātum dadhrire yam vai naḥ śreṣṭhaḥ yaḥ saṃcaran ca a saṃcaran ca na

original: vyathate'tho na riṣyati hantāsyaiva sarve rūpam bhavāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve
analyzed: vyathata ithas na riṣyati hantā asya eva sarve rūpam bhavāma iti te etasya eva sarve

original: rūpamabhavaṃstasmādeta etenākhyāyante prāṇā iti tena ha vāva tatkulamākhyāyate
analyzed: rūpam abhavan tasmāt ete etena ākhyāyante prāṇāḥ iti tena ha vāva tat kulam ākhyāyate

original: yasminkule bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya u haivaṃvidā spardhate'nuśuṣya haivāntato
analyzed: yasmin kule bhavati yaḥ evam veda yaḥ u ha evaṃvidā spardhate nuśuṣya ha eva antatas

original: mriyata ityadhyātmam 14.4.3.[33]
analyzed: mriyate iti adhyātmam

original: athādhidevataṃ jvaliṣyāmyevāhamityagnirdadhre tapsyāsyahamityādityo
analyzed: atha adhidevatam jvaliṣyāmi eva aham iti agniḥ dadhre tapsyāsi aham iti ādityaḥ

original: bhāsyāmyahamiti candramā evamanyā devatā yathādevataṃ sa yathaiṣām prāṇānām
analyzed: bhāsyāmi aham iti candramāḥ evam anyāḥ devatāḥ yathādevatam sa yathā eṣām prāṇānām

original: madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyurmlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥ
analyzed: madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ evam etāsām devatānām vāyuḥ mlocanti hi anyāḥ devatāḥ na vāyuḥ

original: saiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyuḥ 14.4.3.[34]
analyzed: sā eṣā an astamitā devatā yat vāyuḥ

original: athaiṣa śloko bhavati yataścodeti sūryo'staṃ yatra ca gacatīti prāṇādvā eṣa udeti
analyzed: atha eṣa ślokaḥ bhavati yatas ca udeti sūryoḥ tam yatra ca gacati iti prāṇāt vai eṣaḥ udeti

original: prāṇe'stameti taṃ devāścakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti yadvā
analyzed: prāṇeḥ tam eti tam devāḥ cakrire dharmam saḥ eva adya saḥ u śvas iti yat vā

original: ete'murhyadhriyanta tadevāpyadya kurvanti tasmādekameva vrataṃ
analyzed: ete imuḥ hi adhriyanta tat eva api adya kurvanti tasmāt ekam eva vratam

original: caretprāṇyāccaivāpānyācca nenmā pāpmā mṛtyurāpnavaditi yadyu
analyzed: caret prāṇyāt ca eva apānyāt ca na id mā pāpmā mṛtyuḥ āpnavat iti yadi u

original: caretsamāpipayiṣetteno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda 14.4.4.[1]
analyzed: caret samāpipayiṣet tena u etasyai devatāyai sāyujyam salokatām jayati yaḥ evam veda

original: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāgityetadeṣāmukthamato hi
analyzed: trayam vai idam nāma rūpam karma teṣām nāmnām vāc iti etat eṣām uktham atas hi

original: sarvāṇi nāmānyuttiṣṭhantyetadeṣāṃ sāmaitaddhi sarvairnāmabhiḥ samametadeṣām
analyzed: sarvāṇi nāmāni uttiṣṭhanti etat eṣām sāma etat hi sarvaiḥ nāmabhiḥ samam etat eṣām

original: brahmaitaddhi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti 14.4.4.[2]
analyzed: brahma etat hi sarvāṇi nāmāni bibharti

original: atha rūpāṇām cakṣurityetadeṣāmukthamato hi sarvāṇi rūpāṇyuttiṣṭhantyetadeṣāṃ
analyzed: atha rūpāṇām cakṣuḥ iti etat eṣām uktham atas hi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi uttiṣṭhanti etat eṣām

original: sāmaitaddhi sarvai rūpaiḥ samametadeṣām brahmaitaddhi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti 14.4.4.[3]
analyzed: sāma etat hi sarvaiḥ rūpaiḥ samam etat eṣām brahma etat hi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti

original: atha karmaṇām ātmetyetadeṣāmukthamato hi sarvāṇi karmāṇyuttiṣṭhantyetadeṣāṃ
analyzed: atha karmaṇām ātmā iti etat eṣām uktham atas hi sarvāṇi karmāṇi uttiṣṭhanti etat eṣām

original: sāmaitaddhi sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ samametadeṣām brahmaitaddhi sarvāṇi karmāṇi
analyzed: sāma etat hi sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ samam etat eṣām brahma etat hi sarvāṇi karmāṇi

original: bibharti tadetattrayaṃ sadekamayamātmātmo ekaḥ sannetattrayaṃ tadetadamṛtaṃ
analyzed: bibharti tat etat trayam sat eka mayam ātmā ātmā ekaḥ san etat trayam tat etat amṛtam

original: satyena cannam prāṇo vā amṛtaṃ nāmarūpe satyaṃ tābhyāmayam prāṇaścannaḥ 14.5.1.[1]
analyzed: satyena cannam prāṇaḥ vai amṛtam nāma rūpe satyam tābhyām ayam prāṇaḥ cannaḥ

original: dṛptabālākirhānūcāno gārgya āsa sa hovācājātaśatruṃ kāśyam brahma te bravāṇīti sa
analyzed: dṛptabālākiḥ ha anūcānaḥ gārgyaḥ āsa sa ha uvāca ajātaśatrum kāśyam brahma te bravāṇi iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatruḥ sahasrametasyāṃ vāci dadmo janako janaka iti vai janā dhāvantīti 14.5.1.[2]
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ sahasram etasyām vāci dadmaḥ janakaḥ janakaḥ iti vai janāḥ dhāvanti iti

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāsāvāditye puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva asau āditye puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām mūrdhā
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām mūrdhā

original: rājeti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa yaetamevamupāste'tiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām
analyzed: rājā iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ etam evam upāsta ītiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām

original: mūrdhā rājā bhavati 14.5.1.[3]
analyzed: mūrdhā rājā bhavati

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāsau candre puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva asau candre puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā bṛhanpāṇḍaravāsāḥ somo rājeti vā
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ bṛhan pāṇḍara vāsāḥ somaḥ rājā iti vā

original: ahametamupāsa iti sa ya etamevamupāste'haraharha sutaḥ prasuto bhavati nāsyānnaṃ
analyzed: aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ etam evam upāsta ihar ahar ha sutaḥ prasutaḥ bhavati na asya annam

original: kṣīyate 14.5.1.[4]
analyzed: kṣīyate

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ vidyuti puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam vidyuti puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhāstejasvīti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ tejasvī iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ

original: etamevamupāste tejasvī ha bhavati tejasvinī hāsya prajā bhavati 14.5.1.[5]
analyzed: etam evam upāste tejasvī ha bhavati tejasvinī ha asya prajā bhavati

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamākāśe puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam ākāśe puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhāḥ pūrṇamapravartīti vā ahametamupāsa iti
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ pūrṇam a pravarti iti vai aham etam upāse iti

original: sa ya etamevamupāste pūryate prajayā paśubhirnāsyāsmāllokātprajodvartate 14.5.1.[6]
analyzed: sa yaḥ etam evam upāste pūryate prajayā paśubhiḥ na asya asmāt lokāt prajā udvartate

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ vāyau puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam vāyau puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā indro vaikuṇṭho'parājitā seneti vā
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ indraḥ vaikuṇṭha uparājitā senā iti vā

original: ahametamupāsa iti sa ya etamevamupāste jiṣṇurhāparājiṣṇurbhavatyanyatastyajāyī 14.5.1.[7]
analyzed: aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ etam evam upāste jiṣṇuḥ ha aparājiṣṇuḥ bhavati anyatas tya jāyī

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamagnau puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam agnau puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā viṣāsahiriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ viṣāsahiḥ iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ

original: etamevamupāste viṣāsahirha bhavati viṣāsahirhāsya prajā bhavati 14.5.1.[8]
analyzed: etam evam upāste viṣāsahiḥ ha bhavati viṣāsahiḥ ha asya prajā bhavati

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamapsu puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam apsu puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhāḥ pratirūpa iti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ pratirūpaḥ iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ

original: etamevamupāste pratirūpaṃ haivainamupagacati nāpratirūpamatho
analyzed: etam evam upāste pratirūpam ha eva enam upagacati na apratirūpam atho

original: pratirūpo'smājjāyate 14.5.1.[9]
analyzed: pratirūpaḥ usmāt jāyate

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamādarśe puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam ādarśe puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā rociṣṇuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ rociṣṇuḥ iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ

original: etamevamupāste rociṣṇurha bhavati rociṣṇurhāsya prajā bhavatyatho yaiḥ saṃnigacati
analyzed: etam evam upāste rociṣṇuḥ ha bhavati rociṣṇuḥ ha asya prajā bhavati atha u yaiḥ saṃnigacati

original: sarvāṃstānatirocate 14.5.1.[10]
analyzed: sarvān tān atirocate

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ dikṣu puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam dikṣu puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā dvitīyo'napaga iti vā ahametamupāsa iti
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ dvitīyaḥ ūnapagaḥ iti vai aham etam upāse iti

original: sa ya etamevamupāste dvitīyavānha bhavati nāsmādgaṇaścidyate 14.5.1.[11]
analyzed: sa yaḥ etam evam upāste dvitīyavān ha bhavati na asmāt gaṇaḥ cidyate

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ yantam paścācabdo'nūdaityetamevāham brahmopāsa iti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam yantam etam eva aham brahma upāse iti

original: sa hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā asuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
analyzed: sa ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ asuḥ iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ

original: etamevamupāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃloka āyureti nainam purā kālātprāṇo jahāti 14.5.1.[12]
analyzed: etam evam upāste sarvam ha eva asmin loke āyuḥ eti na enam purā kālāt prāṇaḥ jahāti

original: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ cāyāmayaḥ puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ eva ayam ca ayāmayaḥ puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā mṛtyuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
analyzed: ha uvāca ajātaśatruḥ mā mā etasmin saṃvadiṣṭhāḥ mṛtyuḥ iti vai aham etam upāse iti sa yaḥ

original: etamevamupāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃloka āyureti nainam purā kālānmṛtyurāgacati 14.5.1.[13]
analyzed: etam evam upāste sarvam ha eva asmin loke āyuḥ eti na enam purā kālāt mṛtyuḥ āgacati

original: sa hovāca gārgyo yaścāyamātmani puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
analyzed: sa ha uvāca gārgyaḥ yaḥ ca ayam ātmani puruṣaḥ etam eva aham brahma upāse iti sa

original: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā ātmanvīti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya

original: yājñavalkyeti hovāca yadidaṃ sarvam mṛtyorannaṃ kā svitsā devatā yasyā

original: kvāyaṃ tadā puruṣo bhavatītyāhara saumya hastam 14.6.2.[14]

original: ārtabhāgeti hovāca āvamevaitadvediṣyāvo na nāvetatsajana iti tau hotkrasya
analyzed: ārtabhāga iti ha uvāca āvām eva etat vediṣyāvaḥ na nau etat sa jane iti tau ha utkrasya

original: mantrayāṃ cakratustau ha yadūcatuḥ karma haiva tadūcaturatha ha yatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ
analyzed: cakratuḥ tau ha yat ūcatuḥ karma ha eva tat ūcatuḥ atha ha yat praśaśaṃsatuḥ

original: karma haiva tatpraśaśaṃsatuḥ puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpeneti tato
analyzed: karma ha eva tat praśaśaṃsatuḥ puṇyaḥ vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena iti

original: ha jāratkārava ārtabhāga upararāma 14.6.3.[1]
analyzed: ha jāratkāravaḥ ārtabhāgaḥ upararāma

original: atha hainam bhujyurlāhyāyaniḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca madreṣu carakāḥ
analyzed: atha ha enam bhujyuḥ lāhyāyaniḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca madreṣu carakāḥ

original: paryavrajāma te etañcalasya kāpyasya gṛhānaima tasyāsīdduhitā gandharvagṛhītā
analyzed: paryavrajāma te etañcalasya kāpyasya gṛhān aima tasya āsīt duhitā gandharva gṛhītā

original: tamapṛcāma ko'sīti so'bravītsudhanvāṅgirasa iti taṃ yadā
analyzed: tam apṛcāma kaḥ asi iti saḥ ubravīt sudhanvā āṅgirasaḥ iti tam yadā

original: lokānāmantānapṛcāmāthaitamabrūma kva pārikṣitā abhavankva pārikṣitā
analyzed: lokānām antān apṛcāma atha etam abrūma kva pārikṣitāḥ abhavan kva pārikṣitā

original: abhavanniti tattvā pṛcāmi yājñavalkya kva pārikṣitā abhavanniti 14.6.3.[2]
analyzed: abhavan iti tat tvā pṛcāmi yājñavalkya kva pārikṣitāḥ abhavan iti

original: sa hovāca uvāca vai sa tadagacanvai te tatra yatrāśvamedhayājino gacantīti kva
analyzed: sa ha uvāca uvāca vai sa tat agacan vai te tatra yatra aśvamedha yājinaḥ gacanti iti kva

original: nvaśvamedhayājino gacantīti dvātriṃśataṃ vai devarathāhnūyānyayaṃ lokastaṃ
analyzed: nu aśvamedha yājinaḥ gacanti iti dvātriṃśatam vai deva rathā ahnūyāni ayam lokaḥ tam

original: samantaṃ lokaṃ dvistāvatpṛthivī paryeti tām pṛthivīṃ dvistāvatsamudraḥ paryeti
analyzed: samantam lokam dvis tāvat pṛthivī paryeti tām pṛthivīm dvis tāvat samudraḥ paryeti

original: tadyāvatī kṣurasya dhārā yāvadvā makṣikāyāḥ patraṃ tāvānantareṇākāśastānindraḥ
analyzed: tat yāvatī kṣurasya dhārā yāvat vā makṣikāyāḥ patram tāvān antareṇa ākāśaḥ tān indraḥ

original: suparṇo bhūtvā vāyave prāyacattānvāyurātmani dhitvā tatrāgamayadyatra pārikṣitā
analyzed: suparṇaḥ bhūtvā vāyave prāyacat tān vāyuḥ ātmani dhitvā tatra agamayat yatra pārikṣitā

original: abhavannityevamiva vai sa vāyumeva praśaśaṃsa tasmādvāyureva vyaṣṭirvāyuḥ
analyzed: abhavan iti evam iva vai sa vāyum eva praśaśaṃsa tasmāt vāyuḥ eva vyaṣṭiḥ vāyuḥ

original: samaṣṭirapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayati sarvamāyureti ya evaṃ veda tato ha
analyzed: samaṣṭiḥ apa punarmṛtyum jayati sarvam āyuḥ eti yaḥ evam veda tatas ha

original: bhujyurlāhyāyanirupararāma 14.6.4.
analyzed: bhujyuḥ lāhyāyaniḥ upararāma

original: atha hainaṃ kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca
analyzed: atha ha enam kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca

original: yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastam me vyācakṣvetyeṣa ta ātmā
analyzed: yat sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma yaḥ ātmā sarva antaraḥ tam me vyācakṣva iti eṣa te ātmā

original: sarvāntaraḥ katamo yājñavalkya sarvāntaro yo'ṣanāyāpipāse śokam mohaṃ jarām
analyzed: sarva antaraḥ katamaḥ yājñavalkya sarva antaraḥ yoṣanāyā pipāse śokam moham jarām

original: mṛtyumatyetyetaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇāyāśca
analyzed: mṛtyum atyeti etam vai tam ātmānam viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putra eṣaṇāyāḥ ca vitta eṣaṇāyāḥ ca

original: lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti yā hyeva putraiṣaṇā sā vittaiṣaṇā
analyzed: loka eṣaṇāyāḥ ca vyutthāya atha bhikṣā caryam caranti yā hi eva putra eṣaṇā sā vitta eṣaṇā

original: yā vittaiṣaṇā sā lokaiṣaṇobhe hyete eṣaṇe eva bhavatastasmātpaṇḍitaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ
analyzed: yā vitta eṣaṇā sā loka eṣaṇā ubhe hi ete eṣaṇe eva bhavataḥ tasmāt paṇḍitaḥ pāṇḍityam

original: nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca
analyzed: nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāset bālyam ca pāṇḍityam ca nirvidya atha muniḥ amaunam ca

original: maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ kena syādyena syāttenedṛśa eva
analyzed: maunam ca nirvidya atha brāhmaṇaḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ kena syāt yena syāt tena īdṛśaḥ eva

original: bhavati ya evaṃ veda tato ha kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeya upararāma 14.6.5
analyzed: bhavati yaḥ evam veda tatas ha kahoḍaḥ kauṣītakeyaḥ upararāma

original: atha hainamuṣastaścākrāyaṇaḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca
analyzed: atha ha enam uṣastaḥ cākrāyaṇaḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca

original: yatsākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastam me vyācakṣvetyeṣa ta ātmā
analyzed: yat sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma yaḥ ātmā sarva antaraḥ tam me vyācakṣva iti eṣa te ātmā

original: sarvāntaraḥ katamo yājñavalkya sarvāntaro yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro
analyzed: sarva antaraḥ katamaḥ yājñavalkya sarva antaraḥ yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ

original: yo'pānenāpāniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro yo vyānena vyaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro ya
analyzed: yaḥ upānena apāniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ yaḥ vyānena vyaniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ yaḥ

original: udānenodaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaro yaḥ samānena samaniti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ sa
analyzed: udānena udaniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ yaḥ samānena samaniti sa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ sa

original: hovācoṣastaścākrāyaṇo yathā vai brūyādasau gaurasāvaśva
analyzed: ha uvāca uṣastaḥ cākrāyaṇaḥ yathā vai brūyāt asau gauḥ asau aśva

original: ityevamevaitadvyapadiṣṭam bhavati yadeva sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā
analyzed: iti evam eva etat vyapadiṣṭam bhavati yat eva sākṣāt aparokṣāt brahma yaḥ ātmā

original: sarvāntarastam me vyācakṣvetyeṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ katamo yājñavalkya
analyzed: sarva antaraḥ tam me vyācakṣva iti eṣa te ātmā sarva antaraḥ katamaḥ yājñavalkya

original: sarvāntaro na dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāram paśyerna śruteḥ śrotāraṃ śṛṇuyā na matermantāram
analyzed: sarva antaraḥ na dṛṣṭeḥ draṣṭāram paśyeḥ na śruteḥ śrotāram śṛṇuyāḥ na mateḥ mantāram

original: manvīthā na vijñātervijñātāraṃ vijñānīyā eṣa ta ātmā sarvāntaro'to'nyadārtaṃ tato
analyzed: manvīthāḥ na vijñāteḥ vijñātāram vijñānīyāḥ eṣa te ātmā sarva antarā uta unyat ārtam

original: hoṣastaścākrāyaṇa upararāma 14.6.6.
analyzed: ha uṣastaḥ cākrāyaṇaḥ upararāma

original: atha hainaṃ gārgī vācaknavī papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca yaditaṃ sarvamapsvotaṃ
analyzed: atha ha enam gārgī vācaknavī papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca yat itam sarvam apsu otam

original: ca protaṃ ca kasminnvāpa otāśca protaśceti vāyau gārgīti kasminnu vāyurotaśca
analyzed: ca protam ca kasmin nu āpaḥ otāḥ ca protaḥ ca iti vāyau gārgi iti kasmin nu vāyuḥ otaḥ ca

original: protaścetyākāśa eva gārgīti kasminnvākāśa otaśca protaścetyantarikṣalokeṣu gārgīti
analyzed: protaḥ ca iti ākāśe eva gārgi iti kasmin u ākāśaḥ otaḥ ca protaḥ ca iti antarikṣa lokeṣu gārgi iti

original: kasminnvantarikṣalokā otāśca protāśceti dyaurloke gārgīti kasminnu dyaurloka
analyzed: kasmin u antarikṣa lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti dyauḥ loke gārgi iti kasmin nu dyauḥ loke

original: otaśca protaścetyādityalokeṣu gārgīti kasminnvādityalokā otāśca protāśceti
analyzed: otaḥ ca protaḥ ca iti āditya lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin u āditya lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti

original: candralokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu candralokā otāśca protāśceti nakṣatralokeṣu gārgīti
analyzed: candra lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu candra lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti nakṣatra lokeṣu gārgi iti

original: kasminnu nakṣatralokā otāśca protāśceti devalokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu devalokā
analyzed: kasmin nu nakṣatra lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti deva lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu deva lokā

original: otāśca protāśceti gandharvalokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu gandharvalokā otāśca protāśceti
analyzed: otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti gandharva lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu gandharva lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti

original: prajāpatilokeṣu gārgīti kasminnu prajāpatilokā otāśca protāśceti brahmalokeṣu
analyzed: prajāpati lokeṣu gārgi iti kasmin nu prajāpati lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti brahma lokeṣu

original: gārgīti kasminnu brahmalokā otāśca protāśceti sa hovāca gārgi mātiprākṣīrmā te
analyzed: gārgi iti kasmin nu brahma lokāḥ otāḥ ca protāḥ ca iti sa ha uvāca gārgi mā atiprākṣīḥ mā te

original: mūrdhā vyapaptadanatipraśnyā vai devatā atipṛcasi gārgi mātiprākṣīriti tato ha gārgī
analyzed: mūrdhā vyapaptat anatipraśnyāḥ vai devatāḥ atipṛcasi gārgi mā atiprākṣīḥ iti tatas ha gārgī

original: vācaknavyupararāma 14.6.7.[1]
analyzed: vācaknavī upararāma

original: atha hainamuddālaka āruṇiḥ papraca yājñavalkyeti hovāca madreṣvavasāma
analyzed: atha ha enam uddālakaḥ āruṇiḥ papraca yājñavalkya iti ha uvāca madreṣu avasāma

original: patañcalasya kāpyasya gṛheṣu yajñamadhīyānāstasyāsīdbhāryā gandharvagṛhītā
analyzed: patañcalasya kāpyasya gṛheṣu yajñam adhīyānāḥ tasya āsīt bhāryā gandharva gṛhītā

original: tamapṛcāma ko'sīti so'bravītkabandha ātharvaṇa iti 14.6.7.[2]
analyzed: tam apṛcāma kaḥ asi iti saḥ bravīt kabandhaḥ ātharvaṇaḥ iti

original: so'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃśca vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tatsūtraṃ yasminnayaṃ
analyzed: saḥ bravīt patañcalam kāpyam yājñikān ca vettha nu tvam kāpya tat sūtram yasmin ayam

original: ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavantīti so'bravītpatañcalaḥ
analyzed: ca lokaḥ paraḥ ca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti iti saḥ u bravīt patañcalaḥ

original: kāpyo nāhaṃ tadbhagavanvedeti 14.6.7.[3]
analyzed: kāpyaḥ na aham tat bhagavan veda iti

original: so'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃśca vettha nu tvaṃ kāpya tamantaryāmiṇaṃ ya
analyzed: saḥ ubravīt patañcalam kāpyam yājñikān ca vettha nu tvam kāpya tam antaryāmiṇam yaḥ

original: imaṃ ca lokam paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtānyantaro yamayatīti
analyzed: imam ca lokam param ca lokam sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni antaraḥ yamayati iti

original: so'bravītpatañcalaḥ kāpyo nāhaṃ tam bhagavanvedeti 14.6.7.[4]
analyzed: saḥ ubravīt patañcalaḥ kāpyaḥ na aham tam bhagavan veda iti

original: so'bravīt patañcalaṃ kāpyaṃ yājñikāṃśca yo vai tatkāpya sūtraṃ vidyāttaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ubravīt patañcalam kāpyam yājñikān ca yaḥ vai tat kāpya sūtram vidyāt tam

original: cāntaryāmiṇaṃ sa brahmavitsa lokavitsa devavitsa vedavitsa yajñavitsa bhūtavitsa
analyzed: ca antaryāmiṇam sa brahma vid sa loka vid sa deva vid sa veda vid sa yajña vid sa bhūta vid sa

original: ātmavitsa sarvaviditi tebhyo'bravīttadahaṃ veda taccettvaṃ yājñavalkya
analyzed: ātma vid sa sarva vid iti tebhyaḥ bravīt tat aham veda tat ced tvam yājñavalkya

original: sūtramavidvāṃstaṃ cāntaryāmiṇam brahmagavīrudajase mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti 14.6.7.[5]
analyzed: sūtram a vidvān tam ca antaryāmiṇam brahma gavīḥ udajase mūrdhā te vipatiṣyati iti

original: veda vā ahaṃ gautama tatsūtraṃ taṃ cāntaryāmiṇamiti yo vā idaṃ kaśca
analyzed: veda vai aham gautama tat sūtram tam ca antaryāmiṇam iti yaḥ vai idam kaḥ ca

original: brūyādveda-vedeti yathā vettha tathā brūhīti 14.6.7.[6]
analyzed: brūyāt veda veda iti yathā vettha tathā brūhi iti

original: vāyurvai gautama tatsūtram vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāyaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ
analyzed: vāyuḥ vai gautama tat sūtram vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇa ayam ca lokaḥ paraḥ ca lokaḥ

original: sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti tasmādvai gautama puruṣam
analyzed: sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti tasmāt vai gautama puruṣam

original: pretamāhurvyasraṃsiṣatāsyāṅgānīti vāyunā hi gautama sūtreṇa saṃdṛbdhāni
analyzed: pretam āhuḥ vyasraṃsiṣata asya aṅgāni iti vāyunā hi gautama sūtreṇa saṃdṛbdhāni

original: bhavantītyevamevaitadyājñavalkyāntaryāmiṇam brūhīti 14.6.7.[7]
analyzed: bhavanti iti evam eva etat yājñavalkya antaryāmiṇam brūhi iti

original: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yam pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām tiṣṭhan pṛthivyāḥ antaraḥ yam pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīram yaḥ

original: pṛthivīmantaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[8]
analyzed: pṛthivīm antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: so'psu tiṣṭhan adbhyo'ntaro yamāpo na viduryasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ yo'po'ntaro yamayati
analyzed: sa upsu tiṣṭhan adbhyaḥ antaraḥ yam apaḥ na viduḥ yasya apaḥ śarīram yaḥ upa untaraḥ yamayati

original: sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[9]
analyzed: sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: yo'gnau tiṣṭhan agnerantaro yamagnirna veda yasyāgniḥ śarīraṃ yo'gnimantaro
analyzed: yaḥ ugnau tiṣṭhan agneḥ antaraḥ yam agniḥ na veda yasya agniḥ śarīram yaḥ ugnim antaraḥ

original: yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[10]
analyzed: yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: ya ākāśe tiṣṭhan ākāśādantaro yamākāśo na veda yasyākāśaḥ śarīraṃ ya
analyzed: yaḥ ākāśe tiṣṭhan ākāśāt antaraḥ yam ākāśaḥ na veda yasya ākāśaḥ śarīram yaḥ

original: ākāśamantaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ 14.6.7.[11]
analyzed: ākāśam antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: yo vāyau tiṣṭhan vāyorantaro yaṃ vāyurna veda yasya vāyuḥ śarīraṃ yo
analyzed: yaḥ vāyau tiṣṭhan vāyoḥ antaraḥ yam vāyuḥ na veda yasya vāyuḥ śarīram yaḥ

original: vāyumantaro yama> 14.6.7.[12]
analyzed: vāyum antaraḥ yama

original: ya āditye tiṣṭhan ādityādantaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya
analyzed: yaḥ āditye tiṣṭhan ādityāt antaraḥ yam ādityaḥ na veda yasya ādityaḥ śarīram yaḥ

original: ādityamantaro yama> 14.6.7.[13]
analyzed: ādityam antaras yama

original: yaścandratārake tiṣṭhan candratārakādantaro yaṃ candratārakaṃ na veda yasya
analyzed: yaḥ candra tārake tiṣṭhan candra tārakāt antaraḥ yam candra tārakam na veda yasya

original: candratārakaṃ śarīraṃ yaścandratārakamantaro yama> 14.6.7.[14]
analyzed: candra tārakam śarīram yaḥ candra tārakam antaraḥ yama

original: yo dikṣu tiṣṭhan digbhyo'ntaro yaṃ diśo na viduryasya diśaḥ śarīraṃ yo diśo'ntaro
analyzed: yaḥ dikṣu tiṣṭhan digbhyaḥ antaraḥ yam diśaḥ na viduḥ yasya diśaḥ śarīram yaḥ
yama

original: yo vidyuti tiṣṭhan vidyuto'ntaro yaṃ vidyunna veda yasya vidyucarīraṃ yo
analyzed: yaḥ vidyuti tiṣṭhan vidyutā ūntaraḥ yam vidyut na veda yasya vidyu carīram

original: vidyutamantaro yama> 14.6.7.[16]
analyzed: vidyutam antaraḥ yama

original: ya stanayitnau tiṣṭhan stanayitnorantaro yaṃ stanayitnurna veda yasya stanayitnuḥ
analyzed: ya stanayitnau tiṣṭhan stanayitnoḥ antaraḥ yam stanayitnuḥ na veda yasya stanayitnuḥ

original: śarīraṃ ya stanayitnumantaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta
analyzed: śarīram yaḥ stanayitnum antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛta

original: ityadhidevatamathādhilokam 14.6.7.[17]
analyzed: iti adhidevatam atha adhilokam

original: yaḥ sarveṣu lokeṣu tiṣṭhan sarvebhyo lokebhyo'ntaro yaṃ sarve lokā na viduryasya
analyzed: yaḥ sarveṣu lokeṣu tiṣṭhan sarvebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ antaraḥ yam sarve lokāḥ na viduḥ yasya

original: sarve lokāḥ śarīraṃ yaḥ sarvāṃlokānantaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛta ityu
analyzed: sarve lokāḥ śarīram yaḥ sarvān lokān antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ iti u

original: evādhilokamathādhivedam 14.6.7.[18]

analyzed: satyam iti enat upāsīta kā satya tā yājñavalkya cakṣuḥ eva samrāj iti ha uvāca cakṣuṣā

original: vai samrāṭ paśyantamāhuradrākṣīriti sa āhādrākṣamiti tatsatyam bhavati cakṣurvai
analyzed: vai samrāj paśyantam āhuḥ adrākṣīḥ iti saḥ āha adrākṣam iti tat satyam bhavati cakṣuḥ vai

original: devo bhūtvā devānapyeti ya evaṃ vidvānetadupāste hastyṛ 14.6.10.[11]
analyzed: devaḥ bhūtvā devān apyeti yaḥ evam vidvān etat upāste

original: abravīnme gardabhīvipīto bhāradvājaḥ śrotraṃ vai brahmeti yathā

analyzed: paramam brahma na enam śrotram jahāti sarvāṇi enam bhūtāni abhikṣaranti

original: devo bhūtvā devānapyeti ya evaṃ vidvānetadupāste hastyṛ> 14.6.10.[14]

original: satī saṃcaraṇī yaiṣā hṛdayādūrdhvāṃ nāḍyuccarati 14.6.11.[4]

original: avācī
analyzed: avācī

analyzed: viparyeti iti evam eva etat yājñavalkya

analyzed: tat api ete ślokāḥ svapnena śārīram abhiprahatya a suptaḥ suptān abhicākaśīti

analyzed: bhuvaḥ iti bāhū dvau bāhū dve ete akṣare svar iti pratiṣṭhā dve pratiṣṭhe dve ete

original: akṣare tasyopaniṣadahamiti hanti pāpmānaṃ jahāti ca ya evaṃ veda 14.8.7.
analyzed: akṣare tasya upaniṣad aham iti hanti pāpmānam jahāti ca yaḥ evam veda

original: vidyudbrahmetyāhuḥ vidānādvidyudvidyatyenaṃ sarvasmātpāpmano ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: vidyut brahma iti āhuḥ vidānāt vidyut vidyati enam sarvasmāt pāpmanaḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: vidyudbrahmeti vidyuddhyeva brahma 14.8.8.
analyzed: vidyut brahma iti vidyut hi eva brahma

original: manomayo'yam puruṣo bhāḥsatyastasminnantarhṛdaye yathā vrīhirvā yavo
analyzed: manaḥ mayaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ bhās satyaḥ tasmin antar hṛdaye yathā vrīhiḥ vā yavaḥ

original: vaivamayamantarātmanpuruṣaḥ sa eṣa sarvasya vaśī sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ
analyzed: vā evam ayam antarātman puruṣaḥ saḥ eṣa sarvasya vaśī sarvasya īśānaḥ sarvasya adhipatiḥ

original: sarvamidam praśāsti yadidaṃ kiṃ ca ya evaṃ veda 14.8.9.
analyzed: sarvam idam praśāsti yat idam kim ca yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: vācam dhenum upāsīta tasyāḥ catvāraḥ stanāḥ svāhākāraḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ hantakāraḥ

analyzed: svadhākāraḥ tasyai dvau stanau devāḥ upajīvanti svāhākāram ca vaṣaṭkāram ca

analyzed: hantakāram manuṣyāḥ svadhākāram pitaraḥ tasyāḥ prāṇaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ manaḥ vatsaḥ

original: ayamagnirvaiśvānaro yo'yamantaḥ puruṣe yenedamannam pacyate yadidamadyate
analyzed: ayam agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ yaḥ yam antar puruṣe yena idam annam pacyate yat idam adyate

original: tasyaiṣa ghoṣo bhavati yametatkarṇāvapidhāya śṛṇoti sa yadotkramiṣyanbhavati
analyzed: tasya eṣa ghoṣaḥ bhavati yam etat karṇau apidhāya śṛṇoti sa yadā utkramiṣyan bhavati

original: naitaṃ ghoṣaṃ śṛṇoti 14.8.11.
analyzed: na etam ghoṣam śṛṇoti

original: etadvai paramaṃ tapo yadvyāhitastapyate paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya evaṃ
analyzed: etat vai paramam tapaḥ yat vyāhitaḥ tapyate paramam ha eva lokam jayati yaḥ evam

original: vedaitadvai paramaṃ tapo yam pretamaraṇyaṃ haranti paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ jayati ya
analyzed: veda etat vai paramam tapaḥ yam pretam araṇyam haranti paramam ha eva lokam jayati yaḥ

original: evaṃ vedaitadvai paramaṃ tapo yam pretamagnāvabhyādadhati paramaṃ haiva lokaṃ
analyzed: evam veda etat vai paramam tapaḥ yam pretam agnau abhyādadhati paramam ha eva lokam

original: jayati ya evaṃ veda 14.8.12.
analyzed: jayati yaḥ evam veda

original: yadā vai puruṣo asmāllokātpraiti sa vāyumāgacati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā
analyzed: yadā vai puruṣaḥ asmāt lokāt praiti sa vāyum āgacati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte yathā

analyzed: ratha cakrasya kham tena saḥ ūrdhve ākramate saḥ ādityam āgacati tasmai sa tatra vijihīte

original: yathāḍambarasya khaṃ tena sa ūrdhva ākramate sa candramasamāgacati tasmai sa
analyzed: yathā āḍambarasya kham tena saḥ ūrdhve ākramate sa candramasam āgacati tasmai sa

original: tatra vijihīte yathā dundubheḥ khaṃ tena sa ūrdhva ākramate sa
analyzed: tatra vijihīte yathā dundubheḥ kham tena saḥ ūrdhvaḥ ākramate sa

original: lokamāgacatyaśokamahimaṃ tasminvasati śaśvatīḥ samāḥ 14.8.13.
analyzed: lokam āgacati aśoka mahimam tasmin vasati śaśvatīḥ samāḥ

original: annam brahmetyeka āhuḥ tanna tathā pūyati vā annamṛte prāṇātprāṇo brahmetyeka
analyzed: annam brahma iti eke āhuḥ tat na tathā pūyati vai annam ṛte prāṇāt prāṇaḥ brahma iti eka

original: āhustanna tathā śuṣyati vai prāṇa ṛte'nnādete ha tveva devate ekadhābhūyam bhūtvā
analyzed: āhuḥ tat na tathā śuṣyati vai prāṇaḥ ṛte nāt ete ha tu eva devate ekadhābhūyam bhūtvā

original: paramatāṃ gacataḥ 14.8.13.
analyzed: parama tām gacataḥ

original: taddha smāha prātṛdaḥ pitaram kiṃ svidevaivaṃ viduṣe sādhu kuryātkimevāsmā
analyzed: tat ha sma āha prātṛdaḥ pitaram kim svid eva evam viduṣe sādhu kuryāt kim eva asmai

original: asādhu kuryāditi sa ha smāha pāṇinā mā prātṛda kastvenayorekadhābhūyam bhūtvā
analyzed: asādhu kuryāt iti sa ha sma āha pāṇinā mā prātṛda kaḥ tu enayoḥ ekadhābhūyam bhūtvā

original: paramatāṃ gacatīti 14.8.13.
analyzed: parama tām gacati iti

original: tasmā u haitaduvāca vītyannaṃ vai vyanne hīmāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni viṣṭāni ramiti
analyzed: tasmai u ha etat uvāca vi iti annam vai vi anne hi imāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni viṣṭāni ram iti

analyzed: prāṇaḥ vai ram prāṇe hi imāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni ratāni sarvāṇi ha vai asmin bhūtāni

original: viśante
analyzed: viśante

original: sarvāṇi bhūtāni ramante ya evaṃ veda 14.8.14.[1]
analyzed: sarvāṇi bhūtāni ramante yaḥ evam veda

original: uktham prāṇo vā uktham prāṇo hīdaṃ sarvamutthāpayatyuddhāsmā
analyzed: uktham prāṇaḥ vai uktham prāṇaḥ hi idam sarvam utthāpayati ud ha asmai

original: ukthavidvīrastiṣṭhatyukthasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda 14.8.14.[2]
analyzed: uktha vid vīraḥ tiṣṭhati ukthasya sāyujyam salokatām jayati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: prāṇaḥ vai yajuḥ prāṇaḥ hi imāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yujyante yujyante ha asmai sarvāṇi

analyzed: bhūtāni śraiṣṭhyāya yajuṣaḥ sāyujyam salokatām jayati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: sāma prāṇaḥ vai sāma prāṇaḥ hi imāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni samyañci ha asmin sarvāṇi bhūtāni

original: śraiṣṭhyāya kalpante sāmnaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda 14.8.14.[4]
analyzed: śraiṣṭhyāya kalpante sāmnaḥ sāyujyam salokatām jayati yaḥ evam veda

original: kṣatram prāṇo vai kṣatram prāṇo hi vai kṣatraṃ trāyate hainam prāṇaḥ kṣaṇitoḥ
analyzed: kṣatram prāṇaḥ vai kṣatram prāṇaḥ hi vai kṣatram trāyate ha enam prāṇaḥ kṣaṇitoḥ

original: pra kṣatramātramāpnoti kṣatrasya sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda 14.8.15.[1]
analyzed: pra kṣatra mātram āpnoti kṣatrasya sāyujyam salokatām jayati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: bhūmiḥ antarikṣam dyauḥ iti aṣṭau akṣarāṇi aṣṭa akṣaram ha vai ekam gāyatryai

original: padametadu hāsyā etatsa yāvadeṣu lokeṣu tāvaddha jayati yo'syā etadevam padaṃ
analyzed: padam etat u ha asyāḥ etat sa yāvat eṣu lokeṣu tāvat ha jayati yaḥ usyāḥ etat evam padam
veda

original: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmānīti aṣṭāvakṣarāṇyaṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatryai padametadu
analyzed: ṛcaḥ yajūṃṣi sāmāni iti aṣṭau akṣarāṇi aṣṭa akṣaram ha vai ekam gāyatryai padam etat u

original: haivāsyā etatsa yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā tāvaddha jayati yo'syā etadevam padaṃ veda 14.8.15.[3]
analyzed: ha eva asyai etat sa yāvatī iyam trayī vidyā tāvat ha jayati yaḥ syāḥ etat evam padam veda

original: prāṇo'pāno vyāna iti aṣṭāvakṣarāṇyaṣṭākṣaraṃ ha vā ekaṃ gāyatrai padametadu
analyzed: prāṇa upānaḥ vyānaḥ iti aṣṭau akṣarāṇi aṣṭa akṣaram ha vai ekam gāyatrai padam etat u

original: haivāsyā etatsa yāvadidam prāṇi tāvaddha jayati yo'syā etadevam padaṃ veda 14.8.15.[4]
analyzed: ha eva asyāḥ etat sa yāvat idam prāṇi tāvat ha jayati yaḥ usyāḥ etat evam padam veda

original: athāsyā etadeva turīyaṃ darśatam padam parorajā ya eṣa tapati yadvai caturthaṃ
analyzed: atha asyāḥ etat eva turīyam darśatam padam parorajāḥ yaḥ eṣa tapati yat vai caturtham

analyzed: tat turīyam darśatam padam iti dadṛśe iva hi eṣa parorajāḥ iti sarvam u hi eṣa rajaḥ

original: uparyupari tapatyevaṃ haiva śriyā yaśasā tapati yo'syā etadevam padaṃ veda 14.8.15.[5]
analyzed: upari upari tapati evam ha eva śriyā yaśasā tapati yaḥ usyāḥ etat evam padam veda

original: saiṣā gāyatryetasmiṃsturīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā tadvai tatsatye
analyzed: sā eṣā gāyatrī etasmin turīye darśate pade parorajasi pratiṣṭhitā tat vai tat satye
