analyzed: pratiṣṭhitā cakṣuḥ vai satyam cakṣuḥ hi vai satyam tasmāt yat idānīm dvau

original: vivadamānāveyātāmahamadrākṣamahamaśrauṣamiti ya eva brūyādahamadrākṣamiti
analyzed: vivadamānāveyātām aham adrākṣam aham aśrauṣam iti yaḥ eva brūyāt aham adrākṣam iti

original: tasmā eva śraddadhyāt 14.8.15.[6]
analyzed: tasmai eva śraddadhyāt

original: tadvai tatsatyam bale pratiṣṭhitam prāṇo vai balaṃ tatprāṇe pratiṣṭhitaṃ
analyzed: tat vai tat satyam bale pratiṣṭhitam prāṇaḥ vai balam tat prāṇe pratiṣṭhitam

original: tasmādāhurbalaṃ satyādojīya ityevamveṣā gāyatryadhyātmam pratiṣṭhitā 14.8.15.[7]
analyzed: tasmāt āhuḥ balam satyāt ojīyaḥ iti evam u eṣā gāyatrī adhyātmam pratiṣṭhitā

original: sā haiṣā gayāṃstatre prāṇā vai gayāstatprāṇāṃstatretadyadgayāṃstatre tasmādgāyatrī
analyzed: sā ha eṣā gayān tatre prāṇāḥ vai gayāḥ tat prāṇān tatra itat yat gayān tatre tasmāt gāyatrī

original: nāma sa yāmevāmūmanvāhaiṣaiva sā sa yasmā anvāha tasya prāṇāṃstrāyate 14.8.15.[8]
analyzed: nāma sa yām eva amūm anvāha eṣā eva sā sa yasmai anvāha tasya prāṇān trāyate

original: tāṃ haike sāvitrīmanuṣṭubhamanvāhurvāganuṣṭubetadvācamanubrūma iti na tathā
analyzed: tām ha eke sāvitrīm anuṣṭubham anvāhuḥ vāc anuṣṭubh etat vācam anubrūmaḥ iti na tathā

original: kuryādgāyatrīmevānubrūyādyadi ha vā api bahviva pratigṛhṇāti na haiva tadgāyatryā
analyzed: kuryāt gāyatrīm eva anubrūyāt yadi ha vai api bahu iva pratigṛhṇāti na ha eva tat gāyatryā

original: ekaṃ cana padam prati 14.8.15.[9]
analyzed: ekam cana padam prati

original: sa ya imāṃstrīṃlokān pūrṇānpratigṛhṇīyātso'syā etatprathamam padamāpnuyādatha
analyzed: sa yaḥ imān trīn lokān pūrṇān pratigṛhṇīyāt saḥ usyāḥ etat prathamam padam āpnuyāt atha

original: yāvatīyaṃ trayī vidyā yastāvatpratigṛhṇīyātso'syā etaddvitīyam padamāpnuyādatha
analyzed: yāvatī iyam trayī vidyā yaḥ tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt saḥ u ayāḥ etat dvitīyam padam āpnuyāt atha

original: yāvadidam prāṇi yastāvatpratigṛhṇīyātso'syā etattṛtīyam padamāpnuyādathāsyā
analyzed: yāvat idam prāṇi yaḥ tāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt saḥ usyāḥ etat tṛtīyam padam āpnuyāt atha asyāḥ

original: etadeva turīyaṃ darśatam padam parorajā ya eṣa tapati naiva kena canāpyaṃ kuta u
analyzed: etat eva turīyam darśatam padam parorajāḥ yaḥ eṣa tapati na eva kena cana āpyam kutas u

original: etāvatpratigṛhṇīyāt 14.8.15.[10]
analyzed: etāvat pratigṛhṇīyāt

original: tasyā upasthānam gāyatryasyekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadyapadasi na hi
analyzed: tasyāḥ upasthānam gāyatrī asi ekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī a padasi na hi

original: padyase namaste turīyāya darśatāya padāya parorajase'sāvado mā prāpaditi yaṃ
analyzed: padyase namaḥ te turīyāya darśatāya padāya parorajase sāvadaḥ mā prāpat iti yam

original: dviṣyādasāvasmai kāmo mā samardhīti vā na haivāsmai sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate yasmā
analyzed: dviṣyāt asau asmai kāmaḥ mā samardhi iti vā na ha eva asmai sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyate yasmai

original: evamupatiṣṭhate'hamadaḥ prāpamiti vā 14.8.15.[11]
analyzed: evam upatiṣṭhate iha adaḥ prāpam iti vā

original: etaddha vai tajjanako vaideho buḍilamāśvatarāśvimuvāca yannu ho
analyzed: etat ha vai tat janakaḥ vaidehaḥ buḍilam āśvatarāśvim uvāca yat nu ho

original: tadgāyatrīvidabrūthā atha kathaṃ hastī bhūto vahasīti mukhaṃ hyasyāḥ samrāṇna
analyzed: tat gāyatrī vida abrūthāḥ atha katham hastī bhūtaḥ vahasi iti mukham hi asyāḥ samrāj na

original: vidāṃ cakareti hovāca 14.8.15.[12]
analyzed: vidām cakara iti ha uvāca

original: tasyā agnireva mukham yadi ha vā api bahvivāgnāvabhyādadhati sarvameva
analyzed: tasyāḥ agniḥ eva mukham yadi ha vai api bahu iva agnau abhyādadhati sarvam eva

original: tatsaṃdahatyevaṃ haivaivaṃvidyadyapi bahviva pāpaṃ karoti sarvameva tatsampsāya
analyzed: tat saṃdahati evam ha eva evaṃvid yadi api bahu iva pāpam karoti sarvam eva tat sampsāya

original: śuddhaḥ pūto'jaro'mṛtaḥ sambhavati 14.9.1.[1]
analyzed: śuddhaḥ pūtaḥ ujaraḥ mṛtaḥ sambhavati

original: śvetaketurha vā āruṇeyaḥ pañcālānām pariṣadamājagāma sa ājagāma jaivalam
analyzed: śvetaketuḥ ha vai āruṇeyaḥ pañcālānām pariṣadam ājagāma saḥ ājagāma jaivalam

original: pravāhaṇam paricārayamāṇaṃ tamudīkṣyābhyuvāda kumārā3 iti sa bho3 iti
analyzed: pravāhaṇam paricārayamāṇam tam udīkṣya abhyuvāda kumārāḥ iti sa bho iti

original: pratiśuśrāvānuśiṣṭo nvasi pitretyomiti hovāca 14.9.1.[2]
analyzed: pratiśuśrāva anuśiṣṭaḥ nu asi pitrā iti om iti ha uvāca

original: vettha yathemāḥ prajāḥ prayatyo vipratipadyāntā3 iti neti hovāca vettha yathemaṃ
analyzed: vettha yathā imāḥ prajāḥ prayatyaḥ vipratipadyāntai iti na iti ha uvāca vettha yathā imam

original: lokam punarāpadyāntā3 iti neti haivovāca vettha yathāsau loka evam bahubhiḥ punaḥ
analyzed: lokam punar āpadyāntaḥ iti na iti ha eva uvāca vettha yathā asau lokaḥ evam bahubhiḥ punar

original: punaḥ prayadbhirna sampūryatā3 iti neti haivovāca 14.9.1.[3]
analyzed: punar prayadbhiḥ na sampūryate iti na iti ha eva uvāca

original: vettha yatithyāmāhutyāṃ hutāyām āpaḥ puruṣavāco bhūtvā samutthāya vadantī3 iti
analyzed: vettha yatithyām āhutyām hutāyām āpaḥ puruṣa vācaḥ bhūtvā samutthāya vadantī iti

original: neti haivovāca vettho devayānasya vā pathaḥ pratipadam pitṛyāṇasya vā yatkṛtvā
analyzed: na iti ha eva uvāca vetthaḥ deva yānasya vā pathaḥ pratipadam pitṛyāṇasya vā yat kṛtvā

original: devayānaṃ vā panthānam pratipadyate pitṛyāṇaṃ vā 14.9.1.[4]
analyzed: deva yānam vā panthānam pratipadyate pitṛyāṇam vā

original: api hi na ṛṣervacaḥ śrutam dve sṛtī aśṛṇavam pitṝṇāmahaṃ devānāmuta martyānāṃ
analyzed: api hi naḥ ṛṣeḥ vacaḥ śrutam dve sṛtī aśṛṇavam pitṝṇām aham devānām uta martyānām

original: tābhyāmidaṃ viśvamejatsameti yadantarā pitaram mātaraṃ ceti nāhamata ekaṃ cana
analyzed: tābhyām idam viśvam ejat sameti yat antarā pitaram mātaram ca iti na aham atas ekam cana

original: vedeti hovāca 14.9.1.[5]
analyzed: veda iti ha uvāca

original: atha hainaṃ vasatyopamantrayāṃ cakre anādṛtya vasatiṃ kumāraḥ pradudrāva sa
analyzed: atha ha enam vasatyā upamantrayām cakre an ādṛtya vasatim kumāraḥ pradudrāva sa

original: ājagāma pitaraṃ taṃ hovāceti vāva kila no bhavānpurānuśiṣṭānavoca iti kathaṃ
analyzed: ājagāma pitaram tam ha uvāca iti vāva kila naḥ bhavān purā anuśiṣṭān avocaḥ iti katham

original: sumedha iti pañca mā praśnānrājanyabandhuraprākṣīttato naikaṃ cana vedeti
analyzed: su medhaḥ iti pañca mā praśnān rājanyabandhuḥ aprākṣīt tatas na ekam cana veda iti

original: hovāca katame ta itīma iti ha pratīkānyudājahāra 14.9.1.[6]
analyzed: ha uvāca katame te iti ime iti ha pratīkāni udājahāra

original: sa hovāca tathā nastvaṃ tāta jānīthā yathā yadahaṃ kiṃ ca veda sarvamahaṃ
analyzed: sa ha uvāca tathā naḥ tvam tāta jānīthāḥ yathā yat aham kim ca veda sarvam aham

original: tattubhyamavocam prehi tu tatra pratītya brahmacaryaṃ vatsyāva iti bhavāneva
analyzed: tat tubhyam avocam prehi tu tatra pratītya brahmacaryam vatsyāvaḥ iti bhavān eva

original: gacatviti 14.9.1.[7]
analyzed: gacatu iti

original: sa ājagāma gautamo yatra pravāhaṇasya jaivalerāsa tasmā
analyzed: saḥ ājagāma gautamaḥ yatra pravāhaṇasya jaivaleḥ āsa tasmai

original: āsanamāhāryodakamāhārayāṃ cakārātha hāsmā arghaṃ cakāra 14.9.1.[8]
analyzed: āsanam āhārya udakam āhārayāṃ cakāra atha ha asmai argham cakāra

original: sa hovāca varam bhavate gautamāya dadma iti sa hovāca pratijñāto ma eṣa varo yāṃ
analyzed: sa ha uvāca varam bhavate gautamāya dadmaḥ iti sa ha uvāca pratijñātaḥ me eṣa varaḥ yām

original: tu kumārasyānte vācamabhāṣathāstām me brūhīti 14.9.1.[9]
analyzed: tu kumārasya ante vācam abhāṣatha astām me brūhi iti

original: sa hovāca daiveṣu vai gautama tadvareṣu mānuṣāṇām brūhīti 14.9.1.[10]
analyzed: sa ha uvāca daiveṣu vai gautama tad vareṣu mānuṣāṇām brūhi iti

original: sa hovāca vijñāyate hāsti hiraṇyasyāpāttaṃ go aśvānāṃ dāsīnām pravarāṇām
analyzed: sa ha uvāca vijñāyate ha asti hiraṇyasya apāttam goḥ aśvānām dāsīnām pravarāṇām

original: paridhānānām mā no bhavānbahoranantasyāparyantasyābhyavadānyo bhūditi sa vai
analyzed: paridhānānām mā naḥ bhavān bahoḥ anantasya aparyantasya abhyavadānyaḥ bhūt iti sa vai

original: gautama tīrthenecāsā ityupaimyaham bhavantīmiti vācā ha smaiva pūrva upayanti 14.9.1.[11]
analyzed: gautama tīrthena ica asau iti upaimi aham bhavantīm iti vācā ha sma eva pūrve upayanti

original: sa hopāyanakīrtā uvāca tathā nastvaṃ gautama māparādhāstava ca pitāmahā
analyzed: sa ha upāyana kīrtāḥ uvāca tathā naḥ tvam gautama mā aparādhāḥ tava ca pitāmahāḥ

original: yatheyaṃ vidyetaḥ pūrvaṃ na kasmiṃścana brāhmaṇa uvāsa tāṃ tvahaṃ tubhyaṃ
analyzed: yathā iyam vidyā itas pūrvam na kasmiṃścana brāhmaṇe uvāsa tām tu aham tubhyam

original: vakṣyāmi ko hi tvaivam bruvantamarhati pratyākhyātumiti 14.9.1.[12]
analyzed: vakṣyāmi kaḥ hi tvā evam bruvantam arhati pratyākhyātum iti

original: asau vai loko'gnirgautama tasyāditya eva samidraśmayo dhūmo'hararciścandramā
analyzed: asau vai lokaḥ agniḥ gautama tasya ādityaḥ eva samidh raśmayaḥ dhūmaḥ ūhara rciḥ candramāḥ

original: āhuteḥ somo rājā sambhavati 14.9.1.[13]
analyzed: āhuteḥ somaḥ rājā sambhavati

analyzed: vidyut arciḥ aśaniḥ aṅgārāḥ hrādunayaḥ viṣphuliṅgāḥ tasmin etasmin agnau devāḥ somam

analyzed: avāntara diśaḥ viṣphuliṅgāḥ tasmin etasmin agnau devāḥ vṛṣṭim juhvati tasyāḥ

analyzed: āhuteḥ annam sambhavati

analyzed: puruṣaḥ vai agniḥ gautama tasya vyāttam eva samidh prāṇaḥ dhūmaḥ vāc arciḥ cakṣuḥ aṅgārāḥ

analyzed: śrotram viṣphuliṅgāḥ tasmin etasmin agnau devāḥ annam juhvati tasyāḥ āhute retaḥ

original: sambhavati 14.9.1.[16]
analyzed: sambhavati

original: yoṣā vā agnirgautama tasyā upastha eva samillomāni dhūm

original: o yonirarciryadantaḥ karoti te'ṅgārā abhinandā visphuliṅgāstasminnetasminnagnau
analyzed: ā u yoniḥ arciḥ yat antar karoti teṅgārāḥ abhinandāḥ visphuliṅgāḥ tasmin etasmin agnau

analyzed: devāḥ retaḥ juhvati tasyāḥ āhuteḥ puruṣaḥ sambhavati sa jāyate sa jīvati yāvat jīvati atha

analyzed: yadā mriyate itha enam agnaye haranti

original: tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati samitsamiddhūmo dhūmo'rcirarciraṅgārā viṣphuliṅgā
analyzed: tasya agniḥ eva agniḥ bhavati samidh samidh dhūmaḥ dhūma ūrciḥ arciḥ aṅgārāḥ viṣphuliṅgā

analyzed: bhāsvara varṇaḥ sambhavati

analyzed: punarāvṛttiḥ asti

original: dhūmādrātriṃ

analyzed: yeṣām bubhūṣati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: svānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: durge yaḥ evam veda

original: āyatanamāyatanaṃ svānām bhavatyāyatanaṃ janānāṃ ya evaṃ veda 14.9.2.[6]

analyzed: paśubhiḥ yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: jīvitum iti te ha ūcuḥ yathā mugdhāḥ a vidvāṃsaḥ manasā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadantaḥ vācā

original: te hocuryathā klībā aprajāyamānā retasā prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā

original: utkramīrna vai śakṣyāmastvadṛte jīvitumiti tasya vai me baliṃ kuruteti tatheti 14.9.2.[14]

original: sā ha vāguvāca yadvā ahaṃ vasiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tadvasiṣṭho'sīti cakṣuryadvā aham

original: tatsampadasīti mano yadvā ahamāyatanamasmi tvaṃ tadāyatanamasīti reto yadvā

original: aham prajātirasmi tvaṃ tatprajātirasīti tasyo me kimannaṃ kiṃ vāsa iti yadidaṃ kiṃ cā
analyzed: aham prajātiḥ asmi tvam tat prajātiḥ asi iti tasya u me kim annam kim vāsaḥ iti yat idam kim ca ā

original: śvabhya ā krimibhya ā kīṭapataṅgebhyastatte'nnamāpo vāsa iti na ha vā asyānannaṃ

analyzed: jagdham bhavati na an annam pratigṛhītam yaḥ evam etat anasya annam veda

original: tadvidvāṃsaḥ śrotriyāḥ aśiṣyanta ācāmantyaśitvācāmantyetameva tadanamanagnaṃ
analyzed: tad vidvāṃsaḥ śrotriyāḥ a śiṣyantaḥ ācāmanti aśitvā ācāmanti etam eva tat anam anagnam

original: kurvanto manyante tasmādevaṃvidaśiṣyannācāmedaśitvācāmedetameva

original: tadanamanagnaṃ kurute 14.9.3.[1]
analyzed: tat anam anagnam kurute

original: sa yaḥ kāmayate mahatprāpnuyāmityudagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇyāhe
analyzed: sa yaḥ kāmayate mahat prāpnuyām iti udagayane āpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇya ahe
